analyzed: gzhan du na tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa'i tha snyad mi rigs par bstan pa ni / tshul lugs gzhan gyi go skabs ni //
translated: Otherwise, the statement that the conventions of difference and nondifference are not tenable would be included in

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúthe opportunity for another system.‚Äù

original: ci las yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci las yin zhe na /
translated: What is the reason?

original: mngon sum nyid dam zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid dam zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúbecause of direct perception.‚Äù

original: chos can gyi tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa yang rung mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos can gyi tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa yang rung mngon sum gyis 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that whether the property and the property-possessor are different or not, they are not apprehended by direct perception.

original: nges par bzung ba yang chos dang chos can dag la mngon sum med na ma yin pa ma yin nam ji ltar thog ma med pa'i bag chags rtsa ba yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: nges par bzung ba yang chos dang chos can dag la mngon sum med na ma yin pa ma yin nam ji ltar thog ma med pa'i bag chags rtsa ba yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it the case that ascertainment is not possible without direct perception of the property and the property-possessor? How can it be said that the root is the beginningless latent propensities?

original: gang tshe rjes 'gro ldog pa dag //üîΩces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang tshe rjes 'gro ldog pa dag // ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhen there is no difference in the presence or absence of the object,üîΩ‚Äù

original: tha snyad de ni de lta nyid //
analyzed: tha snyad de ni de lta nyid //
translated: ‚ÄúThat convention is just as it is.‚Äù

original: ces bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu mtshan las nges par bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu mtshan las nges par bzung ba yin no //
translated: This is the determination that the sign is the effect of the potentiality that is the cause of the convention.

original: gang gi phyir sgra dang shes pa ni thog pa med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i don gyi yul yin pa de'i phyir de las yan lag can la sogs pa mi 'grub po zhes bya ba nye bar bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra dang shes pa ni thog pa med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i don gyi yul yin pa de'i phyir de las yan lag can la sogs pa mi 'grub po zhes bya ba nye bar bsdu ba ni /
translated: Since the word and the cognition are the objects of the conceptual differentiation that arises from the beginningless potentiality, therefore, the whole, etc., are not established from that.üîΩThis is the summary.

original: de'i phyir yan lag nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yan lag nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore, the whole, etc.‚Äù

original: gal te chos can gyi sgra ldog pa'i dngos po'i yul la chos gzhan ma spangs ba'i phyir de'i brjod pa rnams kyis gzhi mthun pa yin pa gzugs ni bum pa'o zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te chos can gyi sgra ldog pa'i dngos po'i yul la chos gzhan ma spangs ba'i phyir de'i brjod pa rnams kyis gzhi mthun pa yin pa gzugs ni bum pa'o zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If the word ‚Äúproperty-possessor‚Äù is the object of the negation of the property, since it does not abandon the other property, there would be a common locus of their expressions, as in ‚Äúform is a pot.‚Äù

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod bya las gzhan la yan lag can dang 'dus pa la sogs pa de'i yul ma yin na gang gis 'di skyon ma yin snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod bya las gzhan la yan lag can dang 'dus pa la sogs pa de'i yul ma yin na gang gis 'di skyon ma yin snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If the whole, the collection, etc. are not objects of the expression of words such as form, etc., how can it be thought that this is not a fault?

original: gal te yan lag can ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te yan lag can ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the whole, etc.üîΩIf form, etc. are not different in the least, and if the capacity to exclude the nature of non-production of those forms, etc. in that concordant effect is not taken up by the expression of the word pot, and the capacity of white, etc. is taken up,

original: gal te yang gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa cung zad kyang med pa la gzugs la sogs pa rnams mthun pa'i @281b 'bras bu de la mi byed par rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo'i nus pa ni bum sgra brjod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i nus pas
analyzed: gal te yang gzugs la sogs pa tha dad pa cung zad kyang med pa la gzugs la sogs pa rnams mthun pa'i @281b 'bras bu de la mi byed par rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo'i nus pa ni bum sgra brjod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i nus pas
translated: then the expression of the word pot would not be a cause of the production of the effect of the word pot, because it is not a cause of the production of the effect of the word white, etc.üîΩAnd the expression of the word white, etc. would not be a cause of the production of the effect of the word white, etc., because it is not a cause of the production of the effect of the word pot, etc.

original: blangs pa ma yin la dkar po la sogs pa'i nus pa ni blangs pa yin no //
analyzed: blangs pa ma yin la dkar po la sogs pa'i nus pa ni blangs pa yin no //
translated: But it is not so. Therefore, the capacity of form, etc. is taken up by the expression of the word pot, and the capacity of white, etc. is taken up.

original: blangs pa dang ma blangs pa de dag ni gzhi mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid la yang 'dus pa'i sgra nyid dang gzhan la ni rigs kyi sgra nyid yin par bstan pa ni gzugs la sogs zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: blangs pa dang ma blangs pa de dag ni gzhi mthun pa nyid dang mi mthun pa nyid la yang 'dus pa'i sgra nyid dang gzhan la ni rigs kyi sgra nyid yin par bstan pa ni gzugs la sogs zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Those that are taken up and those that are not taken up are the same basis, and the word collection is used for the same, and the word class is used for the different. This is taught by the words form, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi nus pa tha dad pa ni khyad par te nges pa'i 'bras bu la thun mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu yin la de rnams 'phen pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi nus pa tha dad pa ni khyad par te nges pa'i 'bras bu la thun mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu yin la de rnams 'phen pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: The different potencies of forms and so on are their specific, or definite, effects, which are not common effects.

original: blangs pas 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni sgra'i nus pa yin par 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi rjes su 'gro bar brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: blangs pas 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni sgra'i nus pa yin par 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi rjes su 'gro bar brjod pa yin na /
translated: The expression ‚Äúto engage by taking‚Äù is the potency of the word, and it is said to follow worldly convention.

original: de'i phyir 'di lta bur nus pa'i khyad par te nges pa'i mi 'phen par bstan pas nus pa'i spyi'i yul bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di lta bur nus pa'i khyad par te nges pa'i mi 'phen par bstan pas nus pa'i spyi'i yul bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is taught that such specific, or definite, potencies are not projected, the general object of potency is taught.

original: de lta yin na nus pa'i spyi nyid kyi dngos po nyid brjod bya yin pa'i phyir yan lag can la sogs pa ji ltar spangs pa yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: de lta yin na nus pa'i spyi nyid kyi dngos po nyid brjod bya yin pa'i phyir yan lag can la sogs pa ji ltar spangs pa yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: If that is so, since the thing that is the general object of potency is itself the expressed meaning, how is the whole and so on rejected?

original: de mtshungs zhes bya ba smos te //üîΩdes te gzugs la sogs pa rnams de mtshungs pa yang yin la /
analyzed: de mtshungs zhes bya ba smos te // des te gzugs la sogs pa rnams de mtshungs pa yang yin la /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúIt is similar.‚Äù

original: 'bras bu yang yin pa ni chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang yin pa ni chu 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: That is, forms and so on are similar and are also effects, which are the effects of holding water and so on.

original: de'i rgyu ma yin pa ni byed pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu ma yin pa ni byed pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: That which is not its cause is not its agent.

original: snam bu la sogs pa'i gzugs la de rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: snam bu la sogs pa'i gzugs la de rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo ste /
translated: The form of cloth, etc., is the opposite of that.

original: byed pa po la yod pa'i bya ba yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po la yod pa'i bya ba yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted that the action exists in the agent.

original: gang gi phyir nus pa ni nus pa ma yin pa las log pa'i ngo bo yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nus pa ni nus pa ma yin pa las log pa'i ngo bo yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Because potency is the opposite of nonpotency, not something else.

original: gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i nus pa'i spyi bum pa'i sgras brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i nus pa'i spyi bum pa'i sgras brjod pa yin na /
translated: If the universal of the potency of form, etc., is expressed by the word pot,

original: de nyid 'dus pa'i sgra kho na yin gyi rigs kyi sgrar mi 'gyur zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: de nyid 'dus pa'i sgra kho na yin gyi rigs kyi sgrar mi 'gyur zhes zer ba la /
translated: then that is just the word for the collection, not the word for the class.

original: des na 'di'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: des na 'di'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said,

original: bum pa'i sgra kho na nus pa'i spyi la ltos nas 'dus pa yin te /
analyzed: bum pa'i sgra kho na nus pa'i spyi la ltos nas 'dus pa yin te /
translated: the word pot is a collection in reliance on the universal of potency,

original: khyad par gyi nus pa la mi 'phen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyi nus pa la mi 'phen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not convey the potency of the particular.

original: de 'phen pa las ni dkar po bzhin du rigs kyi sgra yin no //
analyzed: de 'phen pa las ni dkar po bzhin du rigs kyi sgra yin no //
translated: But from conveying that, it is a word for the class, like white.

original: nus pa'i khyad par mi 'phen pa kho nas nus pa'i spyi las de de'i zhes bya bar tha dad par rnam par dbye ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par mi 'phen pa kho nas nus pa'i spyi las de de'i zhes bya bar tha dad par rnam par dbye ba bstan pa ni /
translated: The difference of potency is not projected, and the difference of the universal of potency is taught to be different from that.

original: bum ba ye ni gzugs sogs zhes bya ba ste /üîΩtsan dan gyi dri zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa ni yon tan dang yon tan can tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bum ba ye ni gzugs sogs zhes bya ba ste / tsan dan gyi dri zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa ni yon tan dang yon tan can tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúA pot is form, etc.‚ÄùüîΩThe conventional expression ‚Äúthe smell of sandalwood‚Äù does not make the quality and the possessor of the quality different because it exists elsewhere.üîΩThose that are distinguished by the universal of potency are objects of engagement that are different from form, etc., distinguished by something else.

translated: Those that are distinguished by the universal of potency are objects of engagement that are different from form, etc., distinguished by something else.üîΩThose that are distinguished by original: nus pa'i spyis khyad par can du gyur pa rnams ni de las gzhan pas khyad par can du byas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams las gzhan pa 'jug pa'i yul du 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /üîΩde spyi yan lag tu byas pa gang dag gi yin pa de dag gi yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa tsam gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nus pa'i spyis khyad par can du gyur pa rnams ni de las gzhan pas khyad par can du byas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams las gzhan pa 'jug pa'i yul du 'gyur bar bstan pa ni / de spyi yan lag tu byas pa gang dag gi yin pa de dag gi yin gyi gzugs la sogs pa tsam gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: Those that are distinguished by the universal of potency are objects of engagement that are different from form, etc., distinguished by something else.

original: bum pa la nges pa'i don byed nus pa'i spyi'i yan lag dbye ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bum pa la nges pa'i don byed nus pa'i spyi'i yan lag dbye ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Those that are distinguished by the universal of potency are objects of engagement that are different

original: sna tshogs pa nyid kyis ngo bo la nye bar gnod pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa nyid kyis ngo bo la nye bar gnod pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the various names are harmful to the nature.

original: de de ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i ming gi tshig ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i rnam rtog gis sbrul pa'i don gyi dbye ba la gnas pa'i don dang 'jig rten gyi lugs la yang brten nas rnam grangs ma yin pa la sogs par
analyzed: de de ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i ming gi tshig ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i rnam rtog gis sbrul pa'i don gyi dbye ba la gnas pa'i don dang 'jig rten gyi lugs la yang brten nas rnam grangs ma yin pa la sogs par
translated: Thus, the words of names such as ‚Äúpot‚Äù are based on the classifications of objects imagined by the conceptual consciousnesses that arise from beginningless latent propensities.

original: bstan nas / da ni nye bar bsgyur ba dang / tshig phrad dang a'a khya ta la sogs pa rnams kyang brtags pa'i don gyi dbye bas gzhi mthun pa nyid dang cig shos la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi rnam gzhag la brten nas yang bshad par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bstan nas / da ni nye bar bsgyur ba dang / tshig phrad dang a'a khya ta la sogs pa rnams kyang brtags pa'i don gyi dbye bas gzhi mthun pa nyid dang cig shos la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi rnam gzhag la brten nas yang bshad par bya'o zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Having explained the non-enumerated and so on based on the meaning of the words and also based on worldly conventions, now in order to explain the synonyms such as ‚Äúcommon locus‚Äù and ‚Äúthe other‚Äù and so on based on the classifications of objects to be investigated, he says,

original: phyogs 'dis gzhan la yang brjod par bya zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyogs 'dis gzhan la yang brjod par bya zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBy this method, one should speak of the others.‚Äù

original: 'dis te brtags pa'i dngos po'i dbye ba dang 'jig rten gyi rnam gzhag dang / sgra'i nus pa'i ngo bos 'di kho nas sel ba rnams khyad par med pa nyid kyis rang la yod pa'i dbye ba med pa'i phyir sgra ma lus pa'i rnam grangs nyid gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dis te brtags pa'i dngos po'i dbye ba dang 'jig rten gyi rnam gzhag dang / sgra'i nus pa'i ngo bos 'di kho nas sel ba rnams khyad par med pa nyid kyis rang la yod pa'i dbye ba med pa'i phyir sgra ma lus pa'i rnam grangs nyid gsal ba yin te /
translated: This is because the classifications of the objects of investigation, the principles of the world, and the nature of the power of words are all the same. Since there is no difference, there is no classification that exists for it. Therefore it is the very enumeration of all words that is clarified.

original: brtags pa rnams kyi dbye ba ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtags pa rnams kyi dbye ba ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because, due to the absence of any difference in the exclusion of this by the nature of the power of the word, there is no difference in the divisions that exist for it. Therefore, the word is the mere enumeration of all words, because the divisions of the imagined are not understood.

original: rigs kyi sgra ni zhes bya ba ni 'di zhes bya ba la ltos pa yin la tshogs pa'i sgra 'di nyid ces bya ba ni rigs kyi sgrar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra ni zhes bya ba ni 'di zhes bya ba la ltos pa yin la tshogs pa'i sgra 'di nyid ces bya ba ni rigs kyi sgrar 'gyur te /
translated: The word ‚Äútype‚Äù depends on the word ‚Äúthis,‚Äù and the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù becomes the word ‚Äútype.‚Äù

original: nus pa de'i spyi ni gsal bya so so la nges pa gang gi tshe rjod par byed /
analyzed: nus pa de'i spyi ni gsal bya so so la nges pa gang gi tshe rjod par byed /
translated: When the universal of that power is expressed in relation to each individual that is to be clarified,

original: chos gzhan ma spangs pas zhes bya ba 'di la bsams pa'o //
analyzed: chos gzhan ma spangs pas zhes bya ba 'di la bsams pa'o //
translated: it is thought that ‚Äúwithout abandoning other phenomena.‚Äù

original: tshogs pa'i sgra ni 'di la dpe ni /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i sgra ni 'di la dpe ni /
translated: The example for the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù is

original: dper na nags zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na nags zhes bya ba'o //
translated: like the word ‚Äúforest.‚Äù

original: rigs kyi sgra zhes bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra zhes bya ba 'di la /
translated: As for the word ‚Äútype,‚Äù

original: dpe ni / dper na shing zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe ni / dper na shing zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the example is like the word ‚Äútree.‚Äù

original: nus pa'i spyi'i rjod byed kyang nus pa'i khyad par gyi rjod byed rnams kyi res 'ga' zhig mthun pa ni shing dang nags zhes bya ba bzhin du /
analyzed: nus pa'i spyi'i rjod byed kyang nus pa'i khyad par gyi rjod byed rnams kyi res 'ga' zhig mthun pa ni shing dang nags zhes bya ba bzhin du /
translated: The general expression of potentiality is sometimes similar to the particular expressions of potentiality, just as the word forest is similar to the word tree.

original: 'jig rten la sbyor ba kho na ma yin snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten la sbyor ba kho na ma yin snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: But it is not just worldly usage that is at issue.

original: 'on te ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word but is used to introduce a different position.üîΩThe word forest is used in worldly parlance in the sense of a collection of trees, but the word form is not used in the sense of a pot.üîΩThe word form is used in the sense of the four great elements and the form derived from the four great elements.üîΩThe word pot is used in the sense of a collection of form and so on.

original: shing dang nags zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi rnam gzhag las de ltar yod pa @282b las 'gyur ba yin gyi gzugs bum pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin te /üîΩde med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: shing dang nags zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi rnam gzhag las de ltar yod pa @282b las 'gyur ba yin gyi gzugs bum pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin te / de med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The word pot is used in the sense of a collection of form and so on.

original: gal te bstan bcos zhes bya ba ste /üîΩbstan bcos gzhan ni /
analyzed: gal te bstan bcos zhes bya ba ste / bstan bcos gzhan ni /
translated: The word pot is used in the sense of a collection of form and so on.

original: rkang mig la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //üîΩ'jig rten rnam gzhag gi rjes su 'jug pa yin na ;
analyzed: rkang mig la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o // 'jig rten rnam gzhag gi rjes su 'jug pa yin na ;

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams bum par 'gyur bar bstan pa kho na ni dngos po yang dag par zhes bya ba ste /üîΩde mtshungs pa ni 'bras bu yi //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams bum par 'gyur bar bstan pa kho na ni dngos po yang dag par zhes bya ba ste /üîΩde mtshungs pa ni 'bras bu yi //
translated: The word pot is used in the sense of a collection of form and so on.üîΩThe word pot is

original: rgyu min pa ni rnam dpyod pa //
analyzed: rgyu min pa ni rnam dpyod pa //
translated: The non-cause is the analyzer.

original: zhes bya ba 'di la dbyibs kyi khyad par du mngon par 'dod pa bzhin no gzhan du na spyi'i 'bras bu la nus pa med par thal bar 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di la dbyibs kyi khyad par du mngon par 'dod pa bzhin no gzhan du na spyi'i 'bras bu la nus pa med par thal bar 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is like the desire to manifest a particular shape. Otherwise, it would follow that the general effect would be without potency. This is taught by:

original: dbyibs kyi khyad par gang las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dbyibs kyi khyad par gang las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From what particular shape?

original: dbyibs dang ldan pa las tha dad pa de'i dbyibs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyibs dang ldan pa las tha dad pa de'i dbyibs ni ma yin no //
translated: The shape is not different from that which possesses the shape.

original: de rnams de ltar 'byung ba 'ba' zhig ni de lta bu'i tha snyad kyi yul yin pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnams bum pa bzhin du rigs pa shes pa po la gzugs dang bum pa zhes bya bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams de ltar 'byung ba 'ba' zhig ni de lta bu'i tha snyad kyi yul yin pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnams bum pa bzhin du rigs pa shes pa po la gzugs dang bum pa zhes bya bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Only those that arise in that way are the objects of such conventions. Therefore, like a pot, form and so forth are not the objects of the knower of reasoning, for they are called form and pot.

original: phyogs gcig la bsdus pa'i tshig med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzugs la bum pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs gcig la bsdus pa'i tshig med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzugs la bum pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because there is no word that includes one part, it is said that form is a pot.

original: gal te phan tshun khyab pa med pa'i phyir gzugs ni bum pa zhes bya bar gzhi mthun pa ma yin na de bzhin du 'dir yang shing ni shing sha pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te phan tshun khyab pa med pa'i phyir gzugs ni bum pa zhes bya bar gzhi mthun pa ma yin na de bzhin du 'dir yang shing ni shing sha pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If form and pot are not a common locus because they do not mutually pervade, then in the same way, here also, a tree and a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ would not be a common locus.

original: shing sha pas shing la khyab pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: shing sha pas shing la khyab pa ni ma yin te /
translated: A ≈õim≈õapƒÅ does not pervade a tree,üîΩbecause it also exists in a khadira tree.

original: seng ldeng la yang yod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: seng ldeng la yang yod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If you think that,

original: gal te shing dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te shing dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then a tree and a ≈õim≈õapƒÅ are not a common locus.

original: de yang yod pa kho nas yod pa la khyab pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang yod pa kho nas yod pa la khyab pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And that also exists only, but does not pervade existence.

original: 'on kyang rtogs pa 'phen pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang rtogs pa 'phen pa ni ma yin la /
translated: However, it does not project the understanding.

original: de mi 'phen pa khyab bya yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de mi 'phen pa khyab bya yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The pervaded is taught to be that which does not project it.

original: shing blo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: shing blo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: A tree and a cognition of a tree are not a common locus.

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi nus pa dang ldan pa yang 'phangs pa yin zhes bya ba 'di la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi nus pa dang ldan pa yang 'phangs pa yin zhes bya ba 'di la yang ngo //
translated: Here also means that even a specific one that possesses the capacity is projected.

original: gna'i tha snyad ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do //
analyzed: gna'i tha snyad ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad do //
translated: The ancient convention is a worldly convention.

original: rgyu mtshan de las kyang sgra'i nus pa yin gyis rang bzhin gyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan de las kyang sgra'i nus pa yin gyis rang bzhin gyi ni ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the power of words is the cause, not their nature,

original: brda ma bzung na mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brda ma bzung na mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one does not understand without grasping the convention.

original: 'di shing rtog pa nas zhes bya bas sgra las rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di shing rtog pa nas zhes bya bas sgra las rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom the cognition of the chariot‚Äù does not mean that one understands from the word,üîΩbecause the meaning is directly perceived.

original: don mngon sum pa yin pa'i phyir 'di zhes bya bar rab tu grub par rjes su brjod nas shing rtog pa nas zhes pa sa'i sgra brjod par bya ba nyid du grub par byed pa yin no //üîΩde'i phyir sgra ma bzung @283a * //
analyzed: don mngon sum pa yin pa'i phyir 'di zhes bya bar rab tu grub par rjes su brjod nas shing rtog pa nas zhes pa sa'i sgra brjod par bya ba nyid du grub par byed pa yin no // de'i phyir sgra ma bzung @283a * //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom the cognition of the chariot‚Äù establishes the word ‚Äúearth‚Äù as something to be expressed.

original: ba las gnyi ga las byung ba'i shes pa yod pa yin te brda can ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba las gnyi ga las byung ba'i shes pa yod pa yin te brda can ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the cognition that arises from both the word and the object exists, because it would follow that the word would not be grasped.

original: gal te ba lang dag ni nyi shu'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'dri ba yang grangs la ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar bsgyur ba dang tshig phrad dang a'a khya ta dag la yang mtshungs pa bcu 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: gal te ba lang dag ni nyi shu'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'dri ba yang grangs la ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar bsgyur ba dang tshig phrad dang a'a khya ta dag la yang mtshungs pa bcu 'dus pa ste /
translated: If the word ‚Äútwenty‚Äù is used in the question ‚ÄúHow many cows are there?‚Äù the ten similar cases apply to the case of number, as well as to the case of the indeclinable particle, the case of the verbal affix, and the case of the indeclinable particle.

original: bcu phrag gnyis kyi ngo bo gzhan kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bcu phrag gnyis kyi ngo bo gzhan kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement that the nature of the two decades is something else is

original: bstan pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bstan pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the power of the teaching.üîΩThe terms ‚Äúwell-established‚Äù and ‚Äúmanifestly proceeding‚Äù are

original: rab tu gnas pa dang mngon par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa dang mngon par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsgyur ba'o //
translated: prepositions.

original: yod pa'am med pa zhes bya ba ni tshig phrad do //
analyzed: yod pa'am med pa zhes bya ba ni tshig phrad do //
translated: The terms ‚Äúexistent‚Äù and ‚Äúnonexistent‚Äù areüîΩconjunctions.

original: 'tshed par byed ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'tshed par byed ces bya ba ni /
translated: The term ‚Äúcooking‚Äù isüîΩa verbal affix that expresses the particular meaning of the state of the

original: a'a khya ta rnams kyi bya ba byed pa po'i gnas skabs kyi tshig las don gyi bye brag gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: a'a khya ta rnams kyi bya ba byed pa po'i gnas skabs kyi tshig las don gyi bye brag gsal ba yin no //
translated: agent of the action.üîΩIn the same way, the expression of a particular meaning that is to beüîΩunderstood through a conceptual distinction that follows from a particular

original: de bzhin du don gyi dbye ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam rtog gi go bya'i don gyi bye brag la tha snyad du byed pa ni sgra las chung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du don gyi dbye ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam rtog gi go bya'i don gyi bye brag la tha snyad du byed pa ni sgra las chung ba yin gyi /
translated: meaning is a verbal root.

original: sgrub pa smra ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub pa smra ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not a verbalizing

original: sgrub pa smra ba po rnams kyis kyang ma bor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub pa smra ba po rnams kyis kyang ma bor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: of an argument, because even the verbalizers of arguments do not abandonüîΩit.

original: yan lag can nam spyi la yang yan lag gi dbyibs kyi khyad par de las gzhan pa las log pa ma rtogs pas rtogs par mi nus te rjes su 'jug pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag can nam spyi la yang yan lag gi dbyibs kyi khyad par de las gzhan pa las log pa ma rtogs pas rtogs par mi nus te rjes su 'jug pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor can the possessor or universal be cognized, because it is not the opposite of something other than the particular shape of the parts, since it is merely a subsequent attribute.

original: bag chags ji lta ba bzhin dang brda ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa don gyi dbye ba rjes su sgrub pa bzhin ba ni yul de kho na la rigs kyi dmigs bzhin pa ma yin pa yan lag can dang spyi la sogs pa'i yul la ni ma
analyzed: bag chags ji lta ba bzhin dang brda ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa don gyi dbye ba rjes su sgrub pa bzhin ba ni yul de kho na la rigs kyi dmigs bzhin pa ma yin pa yan lag can dang spyi la sogs pa'i yul la ni ma
translated: Cognition in accordance with latent impressions and in accordance with signs establishes the classification of objects, but it is not the case that the object is just the class of the object of the cognition, because the object is the possessor, the universal, and so on.

original: yin no // de ltar spyi'i don gyi dbye ba yul la brten nas sgra'i tha snyad rnam par dbye ba byas nas /
analyzed: yin no // de ltar spyi'i don gyi dbye ba yul la brten nas sgra'i tha snyad rnam par dbye ba byas nas /
translated: Thus, having made the classification of verbal conventions in dependence on the classification of the object, the universal,

original: da ni der gtod pa ma byas pas thog ma med pa'i bag chags tsam gyi rnam rtog gis brtags pa'i don gyi dbye ba la brten nas rnam grangs ma yin pa nyid du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: da ni der gtod pa ma byas pas thog ma med pa'i bag chags tsam gyi rnam rtog gis brtags pa'i don gyi dbye ba la brten nas rnam grangs ma yin pa nyid du brjod pa ni /
translated: now, in order to express the nonenumerated state in dependence on the classification of the object imagined by the conception that is merely the latent propensities of beginningless time, without making an assignment to that,

original: yang na thog ma med pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na thog ma med pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúOr else, in dependence on the classification of the object imagined by the conception that is merely the latent propensities of beginningless time.‚Äù

original: phyi rol gyi don la yang de lta bu'i bag chags yod pa'i phyir brtag par bya ba dang gcig tu byas nas tha snyad du byed pa ni sgrub pa'i yul kho na la yin du zin kyang de bzhin du spyi dang yan lag can la sogs par 'gyur
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don la yang de lta bu'i bag chags yod pa'i phyir brtag par bya ba dang gcig tu byas nas tha snyad du byed pa ni sgrub pa'i yul kho na la yin du zin kyang de bzhin du spyi dang yan lag can la sogs par 'gyur
translated: Even though that is so, the fault of the general and the particular, etc.,

original: ba'i skyon med par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ba'i skyon med par bstan pa ni /
translated: occurring does not exist.

original: gal te sgra don de lta bu yin yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te sgra don de lta bu yin yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is taught by ‚ÄúEven though the object of expression is like that.‚Äù

original: de la ste sgrub pa'i ngo bo'i brjod bya la rtsod byed ni sgrub byed rtogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de la ste sgrub pa'i ngo bo'i brjod bya la rtsod byed ni sgrub byed rtogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: If one argues about the object of expression, i.e., the nature of the proof, one is proving the object of expression.

original: des kyang gzhan gyi 'dod pa cung zad kyang mi 'grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des kyang gzhan gyi 'dod pa cung zad kyang mi 'grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that even that does not accomplish the slightest bit of the other‚Äôs assertion.

original: de ltar brjod @283b bya'i rnam par dbye ba ni rtog pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan las yin par bstan nas brjod kyi rnam par dbye ba yang legs pa'am ma legs pa'i ngo bo bag chags tsam las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar brjod @283b bya'i rnam par dbye ba ni rtog pa tsam gyi rgyu mtshan las yin par bstan nas brjod kyi rnam par dbye ba yang legs pa'am ma legs pa'i ngo bo bag chags tsam las byung ba yin te /
translated: Having taught that the division of the object of expression is from the mere reason of conceptualization, the division of the expression is also from the mere habitual tendencies of the nature of good or bad.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan can kho na yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan can kho na yin no //
translated: It is only the sign of conceptualization.

original: 'di ltar don gyi rnam par dbye ba nyid ni legs pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar don gyi rnam par dbye ba nyid ni legs pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the mere differentiation of the meaning is not the sign of the good,

original: mi legs par 'dod pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi legs par 'dod pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because it exists even in what is considered bad.

original: tha mal pa'i sgra zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha mal pa'i sgra zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúordinary‚Äù is used.

original: 'du byed dang ldan pas 'dus byas pa nyid ni tha mal pa la yang yod pa 'di yang mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'du byed dang ldan pas 'dus byas pa nyid ni tha mal pa la yang yod pa 'di yang mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
translated: The possession of compositional activity is the characteristic of the conditioned, but it exists even in the ordinary. This is also unreasonable. This is demonstrated in the following.

original: mtshan nyid kyis ni 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyis ni 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe desired‚Äù means that which is desired by means of the characteristic.

original: 'on te legs pa nyid dang cig shos nyid 'dus byas dang cig shos nyid yin na de yang rab tu grags pa med na rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te legs pa nyid dang cig shos nyid 'dus byas dang cig shos nyid yin na de yang rab tu grags pa med na rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: If the good and the bad are the conditioned and the unconditioned, and that is not well known, then it is not understood.

original: rtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rtogs pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The lack of understanding is demonstrated in the following.

original: legs par sbyar dang legs min zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: legs par sbyar dang legs min zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWell-formed and ill-formed‚Äù is used.

original: chos dang cig shos kyi rgyu mtshan las ni legs pa dang mi legs pa nyid kyi ngo bo legs par sbyar ba dang cig shos nyid tshad ma go bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos dang cig shos kyi rgyu mtshan las ni legs pa dang mi legs pa nyid kyi ngo bo legs par sbyar ba dang cig shos nyid tshad ma go bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the nature of good and bad is not understood from the reason of Dharma and non-Dharma, and that the good and bad are not established by valid cognition.

original: tshad ma'i rjes su 'jug pa med na grags pa ni med par smra ba'i tshig bzhin du phyin ci log tu go bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: tshad ma'i rjes su 'jug pa med na grags pa ni med par smra ba'i tshig bzhin du phyin ci log tu go bar bstan pa ni /
translated: If there is no engagement with valid cognition, then fame is like the words of a nihilist. The meaning is that it is taught that there is misunderstanding.

original: rnam par gzhag pa tsam du zad cas bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa tsam du zad cas bya ba'o //
translated: The meaning is that it is merely a presentation.

original: yan lag drug pa'i rig byed rgyu med par 'don par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i lung ni by'a ka ra na'i rtsa ba yin no //
analyzed: yan lag drug pa'i rig byed rgyu med par 'don par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i lung ni by'a ka ra na'i rtsa ba yin no //
translated: The scripture that says, The six-limbed Veda is recited without a cause, has the root of a Vyakarana.

original: lung yang tshad ma kho na yin snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: lung yang tshad ma kho na yin snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If one thinks that scripture is only valid cognition,

original: ma mthong ba'i don brjod ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i don brjod ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: [the response is,] The expression of a meaning not seen.

original: lung ni bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis mthong ba'i don gyi yul la yin gyi dngos po la brten pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lung ni bag chags las byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis mthong ba'i don gyi yul la yin gyi dngos po la brten pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The meaning is that scripture is merely a conceptualization arising from latent tendencies, not a basis in reality.

original: de la brten pa yin na ni de sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de la brten pa yin na ni de sgrub pa yin no //
translated: If it were based on that, then it would be the proof of that.

original: ma mthong ba'i don la ma yin du zin kyang 'bras bur rtogs pa na chos kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i don la ma yin du zin kyang 'bras bur rtogs pa na chos kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even if it is not the case that the object is not seen, when it is understood to be the effect, it becomes the effect of the property. This is the meaning.

original: de la yid ches yod min te /
analyzed: de la yid ches yod min te /
translated: There is no confidence in that.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma med pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma med pa'o //
translated: because there is no valid cognition such as perception.

original: de bzhin du tha mi dad pa'i yan lag can dang spyi la sogs pa rnams shes pa'i rgyu ni mngon sum la sogs pas sam tha snyad las kyang rtogs bya ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tha mi dad pa'i yan lag can dang spyi la sogs pa rnams shes pa'i rgyu ni mngon sum la sogs pas sam tha snyad las kyang rtogs bya ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, it is taught that the cause of the cognition of the parts that are not different, the universal, and so on is not understood by perception and so on or by convention.

original: so sor snang ba'i dbye bas tha dad par ni 'gyur na rgya chen por dmigs pas phan tshun rjes su mi 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems @284a * //
analyzed: so sor snang ba'i dbye bas tha dad par ni 'gyur na rgya chen por dmigs pas phan tshun rjes su mi 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems @284a * //
translated: If it were different due to the division of individual appearances, then it would not mutually follow because it would be observed to be extensive.üîΩIf it were the body,

original: pa ni ; gal te lus kyi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: pa ni ; gal te lus kyi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then it would be the body.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa zhes bya ba'i don 'di la'am de bzhin gyi don la yin te /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa zhes bya ba'i don 'di la'am de bzhin gyi don la yin te /
translated: If means if one accepts this, or if one accepts that it is so.

original: yan lag can la sogs pa med par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can la sogs pa med par byas pa yin no //
translated: The whole, etc., are not made nonexistent.üîΩWith regard to that means with regard to the acceptance.üîΩThe demonstration of the fault in both positions is:üîΩThe cause of the whole would be the cause of the parts.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa la phyogs gnyi ga la yang go rims bzhin du skyon bstan pa ni /üîΩma lus rgyu nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa la phyogs gnyi ga la yang go rims bzhin du skyon bstan pa ni / ma lus rgyu nyid ces bya ba ste /

analyzed: re re'i rgyu nyid yin na yang khyab byed mang po 'byung ba yin la de dang 'gal ba gcig nyid ni khyab par byed pa 'gal bar 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
