translated: If the whole were a cause, then since the cause of the

original: lus kyi yan lag gi bskyed bya'i yang shes pa ni dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa rgyu gcig gis nges par gyur ba ni gcig kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin nam de'i phyir rgyu re re nyid la mang po nyid skyon ma yin no snyam du sems pa
analyzed: lus kyi yan lag gi bskyed bya'i yang shes pa ni dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa rgyu gcig gis nges par gyur ba ni gcig kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin nam de'i phyir rgyu re re nyid la mang po nyid skyon ma yin no snyam du sems pa
translated: And is the consciousness that is the product of the body‚Äôs limbs also definitely the same as the one that is the product of the breath? If so, then it would be just one. Therefore, it is not a fault that many are produced from each cause.

original: la / du ma nyid du zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: la / du ma nyid du zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIf you think that . . .‚Äù

original: dbugs dbyung ba la sogs pa la yang du ma nyid kyi phyir du ma nyid kyi skyon spangs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbugs dbyung ba la sogs pa la yang du ma nyid kyi phyir du ma nyid kyi skyon spangs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the fault of being many is not avoided because the breath and so on are also many.

original: phyogs dang po 'chad pa rna ;
analyzed: phyogs dang po 'chad pa rna ;
translated: He explains the first position.

original: 'bras bu gang la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu gang la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhat is the effect of . . . ?‚Äù

original: gnyis pa 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: gnyis pa 'chad pa ni /
translated: He explains the second.

original: 'on te yan lag rnams zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te yan lag rnams zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf you say that the limbs . . .‚Äù

original: dbugs 'byung rngub dag gi du ma nyid du khas len pa la skyon brjod nas gcig pa nyid khas len pa la yang phyogs gnyis pa'i skyon gzhan la thal 'gyur yin pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbugs 'byung rngub dag gi du ma nyid du khas len pa la skyon brjod nas gcig pa nyid khas len pa la yang phyogs gnyis pa'i skyon gzhan la thal 'gyur yin pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Having stated the fault of accepting that the breath is many, he shows that the fault of the second position, accepting that it is one, is also entailed by the opponent:

original: gcig nyid yin na yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gcig nyid yin na yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is one, then it is not the cause of the other.

original: nus pa'i rgyu ni rang gi 'bras bu la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin la des na khyab pa yin te de'i khyab byed 'bras bu nye bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: nus pa'i rgyu ni rang gi 'bras bu la ltos pa dang bcas pa yin la des na khyab pa yin te de'i khyab byed 'bras bu nye bar byed pa yin no //
translated: A potential cause is related to its effect, and thus it is pervasive, since it is the pervader of that effect.üîΩIf it exists but is not present, it is not the pervader. Therefore, like a tree, it is always present, like a sim≈õapƒÅ tree.

original: de yod kyang med na ni khyab byed ma yin pa'i phyir de'i phyir shing nyid la shing sha pa nyid bzhin du rtag tu nye ba yin no zhes bya bas dang po'i 'bras bu'i dus su gnyis pa la sogs pa'i byed pa po nye ba yin par mtshonüîΩpa yin no //
analyzed: de yod kyang med na ni khyab byed ma yin pa'i phyir de'i phyir shing nyid la shing sha pa nyid bzhin du rtag tu nye ba yin no zhes bya bas dang po'i 'bras bu'i dus su gnyis pa la sogs pa'i byed pa po nye ba yin par mtshon pa yin no //
translated: This indicates that at the time of the first effect, the second and so on are present as agents.

original: rtag tu nye ba de de'i tshe mi nye bar gyur pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag tu nye ba de de'i tshe mi nye bar gyur pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That which is always present is not at that time not present.

original: 'on te rgyu'i chos yin pa'i phyir ram gzhan las kyang rung 'bras bu de'i dus su 'bras bu gzhan byed pa ma yin la de lta bu @284b yin na dus gzhan la yang de nyid khyab par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'byung ba yin no snyam du sems
analyzed: 'on te rgyu'i chos yin pa'i phyir ram gzhan las kyang rung 'bras bu de'i dus su 'bras bu gzhan byed pa ma yin la de lta bu @284b yin na dus gzhan la yang de nyid khyab par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mi 'byung ba yin no snyam du sems
translated: But if you think that because it is a causal phenomenon, it is not the agent of another effect at the time of that effect, even though it is like that, it would not arise at another time because it would not be pervasive.

original: pa la gal te du ma'i rgyu min na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa la gal te du ma'i rgyu min na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not the cause of the many, then it is not the cause of the effect.

original: dbugs 'byung rngub la sogs pa'i sgras ni lus gzung ngo //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung rngub la sogs pa'i sgras ni lus gzung ngo //
translated: The words ‚Äúbreathing, etc.‚Äù include the body.

original: nus pa'i rgyu ni rang yod pas 'bras bu yod par go bar byed pa yin te /üîΩdes khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nus pa'i rgyu ni rang yod pas 'bras bu yod par go bar byed pa yin te / des khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The cause of potentiality is understood to be the existence of the effect because of the existence of the cause,üîΩbecause the effect is pervaded by the cause.

original: rgyu nye yang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu nye yang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is demonstrated by the words ‚Äúeven though the cause is near.‚Äù

original: bden te 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa yin gyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin la des kyang 'di'i bdag nyid du gyur pa 'am gzhan yang phul du byung bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bden te 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa yin gyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin la des kyang 'di'i bdag nyid du gyur pa 'am gzhan yang phul du byung bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is true that the nature of the cause of the effect is dependent on the assemblage of the conditions, and not independent, and that it does not make the effect either identical with itself or something else.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: 'bras bu yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: The effect is what is thought of.

original: gzhan dang gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dang gzhan zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is demonstrated by the words ‚Äúanother and another.‚Äù

original: gzhan la ltos pa'i byed pa rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa'i byed pa rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The activity of the cause is dependent on another, because its nature is such.

original: aa ru ra la ltos nas lha 'khru bar byed pa yin pa bzhin du rigs pa shes pa rnams kyis mnyan par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: aa ru ra la ltos nas lha 'khru bar byed pa yin pa bzhin du rigs pa shes pa rnams kyis mnyan par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Just as one would not bathe a god with myrobalan fruit, so one should not listen to those who know logic.

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ltos pa kho na las yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ltos pa kho na las yin te /
translated: The nature of the effect is only dependent,

original: gzhan ni de'i 'bras bu nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan ni de'i 'bras bu nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because another is not recognized as its effect.

original: sad par byed pa rnams kyang dbugs la sogs pa kho na bzhin du sems kyi rgyu nyid ma yin te /üîΩde med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sad par byed pa rnams kyang dbugs la sogs pa kho na bzhin du sems kyi rgyu nyid ma yin te / de med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: And the awakeners are not the cause of the mind, just like the breath, etc.,

original: sad par byed pa'i rkyen kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sad par byed pa'i rkyen kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because they occur even when it is absent. This is taught by ‚ÄúThe conditions of awakening, too.üîΩ‚Äù

original: de lta yin na de'i nges pa gang na yod ce na /
analyzed: de lta yin na de'i nges pa gang na yod ce na /
translated: If that is so, where is its certainty?üîΩThis is stated by ‚ÄúThe prior formations.

original: sngon gyi 'du byed pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: sngon gyi 'du byed pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The phrase the prior formative action is mentioned.üîΩüîΩ

original: 'du byed pa 'bras bu la mi 'khrul par rtogs pa yin na /üîΩdbugs la sogs pa'i nus pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'du byed pa 'bras bu la mi 'khrul par rtogs pa yin na / dbugs la sogs pa'i nus pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: If the formations are recognized as non-erroneous with respect to the effect,

original: des na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the potency of the breath, etc., is not. This is taught by ‚ÄúTherefore, if.üîΩ‚Äù

original: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa gcig nyid ces bya ba 'di nges pa nyid ces bya ba 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa gcig nyid ces bya ba 'di nges pa nyid ces bya ba 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe same for inhalation, etc.‚Äù should be connected with the phrase ‚Äúthis is ascertained.‚Äù

original: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa gcig nyid du nges par byed par gzhan 'dod par khas blangs nas de mi rigs par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba la sogs pa gcig nyid du nges par byed par gzhan 'dod par khas blangs nas de mi rigs par bstan pa yin no //
translated: The response is that it is not tenable to state that the same ascertainment applies to inhalation, etc., because it is accepted that others assert that the same ascertainment does not apply to inhalation, etc., and that is unreasonable.

original: da ni rtogs pa dang 'gal bar brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da ni rtogs pa dang 'gal bar brjod pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, the response that contradicts the opponent‚Äôs understanding is stated:

original: gcig nyid du 'thad pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gcig nyid du 'thad pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not tenable that the same ascertainment applies to inhalation, etc.‚Äù

original: dbugs 'byung ba gcig gi dus su yang don du mi shes pa cig car skyes par mthong ba'i phyir dbugs 'byung ba de las nges par 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba gcig gi dus su yang don du mi shes pa cig car skyes par mthong ba'i phyir dbugs 'byung ba de las nges par 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Because it is seen that many objects are simultaneously cognized at the time of a single inhalation, the ascertainment of inhalation does not arise from that.

original: de lta mod kyi gang du yang 'gro ba na bgrod bya dran pa kho na'i tshe mdun na gnas pa'i shing mthong ba dang de'i me tog gi dri bsnams pa dang / so rtsi la @285a * //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi gang du yang 'gro ba na bgrod bya dran pa kho na'i tshe mdun na gnas pa'i shing mthong ba dang de'i me tog gi dri bsnams pa dang / so rtsi la @285a * //
translated: However, when one goes somewhere, the tree that is in front of one is seen, its flowers are smelled, and one‚Äôs teeth are cleaned with neem leaves.

original: sogs pa'i ro myong bar byed pa dang mkhrang ba la reg pa'i rlung la sogs pas reg par yang byed pa la sogs pa rnams la rim gyis rtogs pa ma yin la cig car rtogs kyang ma 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i ro myong bar byed pa dang mkhrang ba la reg pa'i rlung la sogs pas reg par yang byed pa la sogs pa rnams la rim gyis rtogs pa ma yin la cig car rtogs kyang ma 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: are not cognized gradually, but are cognized simultaneously, and yet there is no error,

original: gnod pa can med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa can med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no contradiction.

original: res 'ga' rim gyis rtogs pas rtogs pa la nges par byed pa cig car bar mngon par rlom pa'i 'khrul pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: res 'ga' rim gyis rtogs pas rtogs pa la nges par byed pa cig car bar mngon par rlom pa'i 'khrul pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Sometimes they are cognized gradually, but it is not an error to assume that they are cognized simultaneously,

original: de kho na'i 'gor ba dang cig shos dag gi rim gyis dang cig shos su yang legs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na'i 'gor ba dang cig shos dag gi rim gyis dang cig shos su yang legs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is good for the one who is devoted to reality to be so in both cases, whether gradually or simultaneously.

original: dbugs 'byung ba gcig gi dus gcig nyid kyi blo skye bzhin pa ni don du ma 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin nam /
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba gcig gi dus gcig nyid kyi blo skye bzhin pa ni don du ma 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the mind that arises at one time of one exhalation of breath not of the nature of grasping many objects?

original: du ma nyid ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: du ma nyid ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: It is not of the nature of many.

original: du ma blo gcig gis shes na //
analyzed: du ma blo gcig gis shes na //
translated: If many are cognized by one mind,

original: zhes smos so //
analyzed: zhes smos so //
translated: he says.

original: rnam pa med pa nyid kyis nye ba dang lkog tu gyur pa med pa'i phyir de dag tsam 'dzin pa bzhin du don ma lus par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa nyid kyis nye ba dang lkog tu gyur pa med pa'i phyir de dag tsam 'dzin pa bzhin du don ma lus par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of the absence of a form, there is no near or far, and therefore, like the apprehension of that mere form, there is the apprehension of the entire object.

original: skyed par byed pa nyid dam nye ba ni nges pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa nyid dam nye ba ni nges pa'i rgyu ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúIs the cause of the production of the object the cause of the apprehension of the object?‚Äù

original: 'gal ba med phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'gal ba med phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúBecause there is no contradiction.‚Äù

original: skyes par byed pa ni shes pa'i bdag nyid thob par byed pa dang bya ba nges pas kyang nye ba'am dbang po yang rung yul 'dzin pa la nges par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: skyes par byed pa ni shes pa'i bdag nyid thob par byed pa dang bya ba nges pas kyang nye ba'am dbang po yang rung yul 'dzin pa la nges par byed pa yin te /
translated: The cause of the production of the object is the cause of the apprehension of the object because the object is ascertained as the object of the action of the cognition that has attained the nature of the object.

original: nges pa med par 'dzin pa ni /
analyzed: nges pa med par 'dzin pa ni /
translated: The apprehension of the object is not ascertained as the apprehension of the object.

original: gcig yin zhes khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig yin zhes khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is asserted that the object is one.

original: 'dzin par 'dod pa yang nges par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin par 'dod pa yang nges par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The object that is asserted to be apprehended is not the cause of the ascertainment of the object.

original: tha dad pa'i phyir dang skyed byed ma yin pa'i phyir dang ngo //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i phyir dang skyed byed ma yin pa'i phyir dang ngo //
translated: This is because the object is different from the cognition and is not the cause of the production of the cognition.

original: de shes pa'i khongs su gtogs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de shes pa'i khongs su gtogs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: The object is not included within the cognition.

original: de'i phyir 'gal ba med phyir te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gal ba med phyir te /
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction.

original: mi mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam shes thams cad 'byung 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: mi mthun pa ma yin pa'i phyir rnam shes thams cad 'byung 'gyur ro ;
translated: because they are not incompatible.

original: gang gi tshe rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa'i blo yang dus gcig gi tshe byung ba ni thams cad 'dzin par byed pa ma yin la de'i rim gyis kyang yul de dang de 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa'i blo yang dus gcig gi tshe byung ba ni thams cad 'dzin par byed pa ma yin la de'i rim gyis kyang yul de dang de 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: When an incompatible idea occurs at the same time, it does not apprehend everything, nor does it apprehend that object in sequence,

original: mi mthun pa ma yin pa nyid kyi khyad par dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa ma yin pa nyid kyi khyad par dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not incompatible, and there is no difference or incompatibility in its characteristics.

original: mi mthun pa ma yin pa nyid tsam rgyu mtshan can khyab byed yin na de yod na nges par 'gyur la mi 'gyur na ni de'i tshe rgyu mtshan can ma yin gyi gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan can du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gal ba khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa ma yin pa nyid tsam rgyu mtshan can khyab byed yin na de yod na nges par 'gyur la mi 'gyur na ni de'i tshe rgyu mtshan can ma yin gyi gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan can du 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gal ba khyab pa yin no //
translated: If mere non-incompatibility is the reason for the pervasion, then when it exists, there would be certainty. If it were not so, then it would not be the reason, but would be the reason for another. Therefore, there would be a contradictory pervasion.

original: de'i phyir gcig la yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig la yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it would not be so even for one.

original: rim gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni re res kyang zhes bya ba'i @285b don to //
analyzed: rim gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni re res kyang zhes bya ba'i @285b don to //
translated: In sequence means by each one.

original: dbugs gcig kyang nges pa med pa kho nar 'gyur na nges pa dang 'gal ba khyab pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin yang dbugs de las rtogs pa yin na de las shes yang brjod pa don gzhan du 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /üîΩ'dzin pa de nyid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbugs gcig kyang nges pa med pa kho nar 'gyur na nges pa dang 'gal ba khyab pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin yang dbugs de las rtogs pa yin na de las shes yang brjod pa don gzhan du 'gyur bar bstan pa ni / 'dzin pa de nyid ces bya ba ste /
translated: The line ‚Äúthat very apprehension‚Äù teaches that the breath would be something other than what is expressed.

original: 'di yang rnam shes nus pa nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis rnam par dpyad pa kho na yin par bsam par bya'o //üîΩdu ma blo gcig gis shes na //
analyzed: 'di yang rnam shes nus pa nges pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis rnam par dpyad pa kho na yin par bsam par bya'o // du ma blo gcig gis shes na //
translated: This is also an analysis, because it is said, ‚Äúbecause the potency of consciousness is ascertained.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba 'di yang gnas skabs pa'i tshad ma la mi ltos pa me long dri ma med pa lta bu'i blo gcig pu rtag pa'i sems kyi ngo bor gzhan gyis khas blangs pa la brten nas bshad pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di yang gnas skabs pa'i tshad ma la mi ltos pa me long dri ma med pa lta bu'i blo gcig pu rtag pa'i sems kyi ngo bor gzhan gyis khas blangs pa la brten nas bshad pa ni /
translated: The line ‚Äúif many are known by one mind‚Äù is an explanation based on the assertion by others that a single permanent mind is the nature of consciousness, which does not rely on a temporary valid knowledge, like a stainless mirror.

original: 'on te yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'o //üîΩ'dis ni rgyal dpog pa'i gzhung bsal ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'o // 'dis ni rgyal dpog pa'i gzhung bsal ba yin gyi /
translated: This is what is called mental consciousness.üîΩThis refutes the Vai≈õe·π£ika text.

original: rgyang 'phen pa'i bsal ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyang 'phen pa'i bsal ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not refute the LokƒÅyata.

original: de ni blo rtag par khas len pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni blo rtag par khas len pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not a permanent cognition,

original: 'jig rten pha rol med par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol med par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is asserted that there is no afterlife.

original: de'i gzhung las dbugs gcig po las skyes pa'i blo gcig kho na rim gyis don du ma shes pa yin zhes bya ba kho nar bshad par bya ba yin no //üîΩgal te rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba med pa nyid thob nas te /
analyzed: de'i gzhung las dbugs gcig po las skyes pa'i blo gcig kho na rim gyis don du ma shes pa yin zhes bya ba kho nar bshad par bya ba yin no // gal te rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba med pa nyid thob nas te /
translated: In their scriptures, it is explained that only one cognition arises from one breath, and that one gradually cognizes many objects.

original: thob par byas nas so //
analyzed: thob par byas nas so //
translated: If one obtains, that is, achieves, the state of what is called ‚Äúnon-cognition,‚ÄùüîΩbecause there is no special proximity,

original: nye ba'i rim pa khyad par can med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i blo la don gyi khyad par bskyed bya dang cig shos med pas don nye ba dang nye ba ma yin pa dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i rim pa khyad par can med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i blo la don gyi khyad par bskyed bya dang cig shos med pas don nye ba dang nye ba ma yin pa dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: that is, because there is no difference between the produced and the other in a permanent cognition, there is no difference between objects that are near and those that are not near.

original: nye ba'i don 'dzin pa la rgyu rnam shes kyi bdag nyid du gnas pa ni nye ba ma yin pa'i yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: nye ba'i don 'dzin pa la rgyu rnam shes kyi bdag nyid du gnas pa ni nye ba ma yin pa'i yang mtshungs so //
translated: The cause that apprehends a near object, which is the nature of consciousness, is the same for a not near object.

original: mtshungs pa'i phyir 'gal ba'i don ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i phyir 'gal ba'i don ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Because it is the same, it is shown that it is not a contradictory object.

original: me long rnam par gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni nye ba 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan nye ba ma yin pa la yang mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: me long rnam par gnas pa'i zhes bya ba ni nye ba 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan nye ba ma yin pa la yang mtshungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the mirror‚Äù means that the reason for the apprehension of the reflection is not the proximity of the object.

original: rgyu mtshan la khyad par med kyang gal te nye ba med pa mi 'dzin na nye ba la yang der mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan la khyad par med kyang gal te nye ba med pa mi 'dzin na nye ba la yang der mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though there is no difference in the reason, if the reflection is not apprehended when it is not proximate, then it will not be apprehended when it is proximate.

original: 'on te de'i tshe nus pa med na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te de'i tshe nus pa med na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not apprehended when it is proximate, then it is not apprehended at all.

original: blo rtag pa'i phyogs zhar la byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas dbugs 'byung ba nges pa can gyi phyogs nyid rjes su 'brel pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: blo rtag pa'i phyogs zhar la byung ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas dbugs 'byung ba nges pa can gyi phyogs nyid rjes su 'brel pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The author of the commentary has completed the discussion of the position that the mind is permanent. He now continues the discussion of the position that the breath is definite.

original: 'on te 'di snyam du sems zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te 'di snyam du sems zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If you think this,

original: de la yang zhes pa ni dbugs nges par byed pa'i phyogs la yang ngo //
analyzed: de la yang zhes pa ni dbugs nges par byed pa'i phyogs la yang ngo //
translated: the phrase ‚Äúin that case‚Äù refers to the position that the breath is definite.

original: dbugs la sogs pa gcig @286a * //
analyzed: dbugs la sogs pa gcig @286a * //
translated: The breath and so on are not definite.

original: nyid yin yang rtag pa'i phyir 'bras bu phyi ma byed pa'i ngo bo snga na med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de kho na de yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyid yin yang rtag pa'i phyir 'bras bu phyi ma byed pa'i ngo bo snga na med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de kho na de yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But even if it were, the effect would not occur earlier, because the nature of the prior non-existence of the later effect does not exist.

original: shes pa gsal ba mang po'i yin par ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: shes pa gsal ba mang po'i yin par ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable that it is of many cognitions,

original: dbugs gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbugs gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the same breath.

original: skad cig ma'i dbugs mang po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma'i dbugs mang po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is many momentary breaths.

original: dus gcig pa rnams kyang yod pa'i phyir de kho na gsal ba mang po'i yin no zhe na yang zhes bya ba la zer ba ni /
analyzed: dus gcig pa rnams kyang yod pa'i phyir de kho na gsal ba mang po'i yin no zhe na yang zhes bya ba la zer ba ni /
translated: Even if it is of those that exist at the same time, it is of many cognitions.

original: rang rig min pa'i dus can gyi ste rim gyis 'byung ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang rig min pa'i dus can gyi ste rim gyis 'byung ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is of those that have a time that is not self-awareness, that is, that arise in sequence.

original: de 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni rim gyis 'byung ba rnams kyi ste sems re re'i skyed byed kho na dbugs re re'i skyed byed yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni rim gyis 'byung ba rnams kyi ste sems re re'i skyed byed kho na dbugs re re'i skyed byed yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Such is the meaning of ‚Äúlike that.‚Äù The meaning is that the producer of each mind is the producer of each breath.

original: de lta yin yang dbugs de rnams nyid rim pa dang ldan par mi 'grub ste rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta yin yang dbugs de rnams nyid rim pa dang ldan par mi 'grub ste rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if that were so, those breaths themselves would not be established as having a sequence, because there is no cause.

original: lus ni ma yin te /
analyzed: lus ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the body,

original: du ma nyid yin pas rnam shes bzhin du de la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du ma nyid yin pas rnam shes bzhin du de la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because it is multiple, like consciousness.

original: go rims ldan pa'i rgyu med phyir //
analyzed: go rims ldan pa'i rgyu med phyir //
translated: Because there is no cause for the order.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what it says.

original: da ltar ba bzhin du snga ma snga ma'i rang gi rigs rgyu nyid yin yang skye ba'i dang po la 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: da ltar ba bzhin du snga ma snga ma'i rang gi rigs rgyu nyid yin yang skye ba'i dang po la 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even though the prior states of the same type are the cause, like the present states, the first arising of birth does not occur,

original: 'jig rten pha rol khas mi len pas rang gi rigs kyi snga ma med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol khas mi len pas rang gi rigs kyi snga ma med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: because one does not accept a prior state of the same type in another world, because there is no prior state of the same type.

original: rang rigs snga ma rgyu nyid ni //
analyzed: rang rigs snga ma rgyu nyid ni //
translated: The prior state of the same type is the cause.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what it says.

original: skye ba'i dang po'i dbugs ni res 'ga' ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yin gyi rgyu ci yin par rtogs par byed pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: skye ba'i dang po'i dbugs ni res 'ga' ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yin gyi rgyu ci yin par rtogs par byed pa ma yin nam snyam du sems pa la /
translated: Since the first breath of birth is not occasional, it is a result, not a cause.

original: des de dbugs de 'dra ba zhes bya ba rang gi rigs yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des de dbugs de 'dra ba zhes bya ba rang gi rigs yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The first breath is not of that type, because there is no prior state of the same type.

original: 'jig rten pha rol khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One does not accept a prior state of the same type in another world.

original: rigs tha dad pa yang rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs tha dad pa yang rgyu ma yin te /
translated: A different type is not the cause.

original: 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs na ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs na ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen at the time of life.

original: de'i bskyed bya gzhan gyi tshe gzhan gyi bskyed bya ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya gzhan gyi tshe gzhan gyi bskyed bya ni ma yin te /
translated: The product of that is not the product of another at another time,

original: 'bras bu nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it is not an effect.

original: gzhan gyi bskyed bya ba nyid du khas len pa yin na de yang gzhan gyi lus yin te gzhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bskyed bya ba nyid du khas len pa yin na de yang gzhan gyi lus yin te gzhan ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is accepted that it is the product of another, then that is another body, because another is not seen.

original: de yang du ma yin pa'i phyir dbugs kyang du ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang du ma yin pa'i phyir dbugs kyang du ma yin no //
translated: And because that is many, the breath is also many.

original: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yang dus gcig la du mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yang dus gcig la du mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, its effect would also be many at one time.

original: de'i phyir de kho na ma nges pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na ma nges pa nyid yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is shown that it is just uncertain:

original: du ma nyid yod kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: du ma nyid yod kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even though there is multiplicity.

original: rgyu du ma nyid ma yin gyi so so snang ba las kyang tha dad pa yul can phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyu du ma nyid ma yin gyi so so snang ba las kyang tha dad pa yul can phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The reason is not the multiplicity of causes, but rather the difference from the individual appearances, because the object is internal.

original: @286b rgya che bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @286b rgya che bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is observed to be extensive.

original: khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is shown that it contradicts what is accepted:

original: khyed la ni zhes bya'o //
analyzed: khyed la ni zhes bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúYou‚Äù is the subject.

original: pha'i dbugs sngon du 'gro ba can yin yang rang gi rigs snga ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi rang gi goms pa'i 'bras bu la dbye ba med pa'i phyir gcig gi ngo bo'i dbugs su 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: pha'i dbugs sngon du 'gro ba can yin yang rang gi rigs snga ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi rang gi goms pa'i 'bras bu la dbye ba med pa'i phyir gcig gi ngo bo'i dbugs su 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though the father‚Äôs breath precedes it, since it is the effect of one‚Äôs own habituation, which is endowed with the previous type, it is undifferentiated, and therefore it is the breath of one‚Äôs own nature.

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid du gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid du gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSuch a nature‚Äù is the subject.

original: thal ba snga ma'i zhes bya ba ni rang gi goms pa'i 'bras bu'i dbye byed med pa'i phyir gcig gi ngo bor 'gyur te /
analyzed: thal ba snga ma'i zhes bya ba ni rang gi goms pa'i 'bras bu'i dbye byed med pa'i phyir gcig gi ngo bor 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe previous consequence‚Äù is that since it is the effect of one‚Äôs own habituation, it is undifferentiated, and therefore it is the breath of one‚Äôs own nature.

original: pha dang ma'i dbugs rgyu nyid yin par khas blangs kyang ngo //
analyzed: pha dang ma'i dbugs rgyu nyid yin par khas blangs kyang ngo //
translated: Even though the father‚Äôs and mother‚Äôs breath is accepted as the cause, it is not the case that the breath of the child is a mixture of the two.

original: brdar rtogs par byed pa na yang ba lang mthong ba las zhes bya ba'i rigs pas rnam shes du ma skye bar 'dod pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: brdar rtogs par byed pa na yang ba lang mthong ba las zhes bya ba'i rigs pas rnam shes du ma skye bar 'dod pa kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: When one is made to understand the conventional, it is asserted that the arising of multiple consciousnesses is like the reasoning of ‚Äúseeing a cow.‚Äù

original: rigs mthun pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rigs mthun pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúOf a similar type‚Äù is the subject.

original: gal te rigs tha dad pa cig car skye ba yang mtshungs par ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te rigs tha dad pa cig car skye ba yang mtshungs par ni ma yin te /
translated: If the arising of different types is simultaneous, it is not the same.

original: ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not seen.

original: gal te yang dbugs kyi skad cig ma mang po rnams cig car skye ba yin na de rnams kho na shes pa re re skyed par byed pa yin te tha dad pa'i phyir rigs tha dad pa skyed par byed pa yin gyi rigs mtshungs pa'i skyed byed ni
analyzed: gal te yang dbugs kyi skad cig ma mang po rnams cig car skye ba yin na de rnams kho na shes pa re re skyed par byed pa yin te tha dad pa'i phyir rigs tha dad pa skyed par byed pa yin gyi rigs mtshungs pa'i skyed byed ni
translated: If many moments of breath were to arise simultaneously, then they would generate each cognition, because they are distinct, they would generate different types, but they do not generate a similar type.

original: ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If you think this,

original: skad cig tha dad pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skad cig tha dad pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúBecause they are distinct moments.‚Äù

original: dbugs lus bzhin du du ma nyid yin na /
analyzed: dbugs lus bzhin du du ma nyid yin na /
translated: If the breath is multiple like the body,

original: re re rgyu nyid yin pas cig car mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon la de'i phyir blo ni cig car skye ba zhes bya ba 'dis bstan nas /
analyzed: re re rgyu nyid yin pas cig car mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon la de'i phyir blo ni cig car skye ba zhes bya ba 'dis bstan nas /
translated: then the error would arise that many would occur simultaneously because each would be the cause. Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThe mind arises simultaneously,‚Äù and this is explained.

original: lus rgyu nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: lus rgyu nyid yin na ni /
translated: If the body were the cause,

original: yan lag gcig dang bral na 'ang min //
analyzed: yan lag gcig dang bral na 'ang min //
translated: it would not be so if one part were missing.

original: zhes bya ba bzlas nas brjod pas bstan pa ni /üîΩgal te du ma'ang gcig dus can //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bzlas nas brjod pas bstan pa ni / gal te du ma'ang gcig dus can //
translated: This is stated by repeating the phrase.üîΩIf many are simultaneous,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúIf many are simultaneous, they are one.‚Äù

original: 'on te gang dang gang dbugs kyi nye ba'i yan lag yin pa de dang de shes pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te gang dang gang dbugs kyi nye ba'i yan lag yin pa de dang de shes pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Or do you think that whatever is a proximate factor of inhalation is the cause of the knowledge of that?

original: ji ste ji ltar yod rgyu yin //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ste ji ltar yod rgyu yin // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If so, then how could it exist?

original: ji ltar yod pa ni ji ltar srid pa yin la /
analyzed: ji ltar yod pa ni ji ltar srid pa yin la /
translated: How could it exist? How could it be possible?üîΩInhalation is the cause of the increase and decrease of the proximate factors.

original: dbugs ni phul du byung ba'i yan lag dang 'grib pa'i yan lag kyang rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbugs ni phul du byung ba'i yan lag dang 'grib pa'i yan lag kyang rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The response:

original: lan ni // shes pa la yang khyad par yod 'gyur te phul du byung ba dang 'gro ba nyid do //
analyzed: lan ni // shes pa la yang khyad par yod 'gyur te phul du byung ba dang 'gro ba nyid do //
translated: Consciousness would also have a distinction, because of increase and decrease.

original: rgyu rnams par 'gyur ba yin yang de'i 'bras bu rnam par 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu rnams par 'gyur ba yin yang de'i 'bras bu rnam par 'gyur ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though the causes change, it is taught that their effect does not change:

original: de de'i 'bras bu min zhes bya ba ste /üîΩtha dad par khyad par med @287a * //üîΩpas tha dad min te /
analyzed: de de'i 'bras bu min zhes bya ba ste / tha dad par khyad par med @287a * // pas tha dad min te /
translated: It is not its effect.üîΩSince there is no distinction in the difference, there is no difference.üîΩThere is no distinction.

original: khyad par du mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: khyad par du mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: There is no change.

original: de'i khyad par gyi khyad par can nyid yin na de'i 'bras bu nyid rtogs pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i khyad par gyi khyad par can nyid yin na de'i 'bras bu nyid rtogs pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If it is the special of that, then it is understood to be its effect.

original: tshogs pa dang ma tshogs pa dag zad pa dbugs zhan par rgyu ba la sogs pa rnams la ste /
analyzed: tshogs pa dang ma tshogs pa dag zad pa dbugs zhan par rgyu ba la sogs pa rnams la ste /
translated: In the case of those who have a weak breath, etc., whether the collection is complete or not.

original: nyung ba nyid lam tshang ba nyid ni med pa'o //
analyzed: nyung ba nyid lam tshang ba nyid ni med pa'o //
translated: The absence of the complete collection is the absence of the small.

original: de lta bu'i de ni gnyi ga la yang tshogs pa med pa kho na ma yin par bstan pa ni de med par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i de ni gnyi ga la yang tshogs pa med pa kho na ma yin par bstan pa ni de med par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not that such a collection is absent in both cases. This is indicated by the phrase ‚Äúits absence is not found.‚Äù

original: ji ltar yod rgyu zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni ji ltar gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //üîΩgal te ji ltar yod pa'i rgyu yin na nye ba na gnas pa ma yin pa yang rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ji ltar yod rgyu zhes bya ba'i bshad pa ni ji ltar gnas pa zhes bya ba'o // gal te ji ltar yod pa'i rgyu yin na nye ba na gnas pa ma yin pa yang rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúhow could it exist‚Äù is the same as ‚Äúhow could it be located.‚Äù

original: de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is the cause of what exists, then even if it is not located nearby, it would be the cause. This is indicated by the phrase ‚Äúif that is so.‚Äù

original: de ltar ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni yul la sogs pas gsal ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni yul la sogs pas gsal ba ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat is not so‚Äù indicates that the clarity of the object, etc.,

original: rgyu yin pa mi srid de rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu yin pa mi srid de rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is impossible that it is the cause, because there is no concomitance or absence.

original: de'i phyir rgyu'i khyad par gyis khyad par can 'bras bu yin par bstan pa ni de'i phyir tshogs pa las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu'i khyad par gyis khyad par can 'bras bu yin par bstan pa ni de'i phyir tshogs pa las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the result is qualified by the difference of the cause.

original: gzhan du gyur pa las zhes bya ni mi nye ba las so //
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa las zhes bya ni mi nye ba las so //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom a transformation‚Äù means from a non-proximate [cause].

original: gang zhig gang gi rnams par 'gyur bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rnams par 'gyur bar byed pa ni /
translated: That which transforms something

original: yod na 'byung ba yin par shes pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yod na 'byung ba yin par shes pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: is known as the cause when it exists.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so,

original: de 'gyur ba nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de 'gyur ba nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is said ‚Äúfrom its transformation.‚Äù

original: de 'gyur ba nyid med na yang de'i chos kyi ngo bo ni de med na med pa'i phyir ci las de'i 'bras bur ma gyur snyam du sems pa la de yod na ni yod tsam gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de 'gyur ba nyid med na yang de'i chos kyi ngo bo ni de med na med pa'i phyir ci las de'i 'bras bur ma gyur snyam du sems pa la de yod na ni yod tsam gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Even if there is no transformation of that, since the nature of its attribute does not exist without it, how could it not be its result? Thinking this, [the author] says ‚Äúwhen it exists, by the mere existence.‚Äù

original: de'i 'gyur ba dag rgyu dang ldan pa dag ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i 'gyur ba dag rgyu dang ldan pa dag ma yin na /
translated: If its transformation does not have a cause,

original: de'i chos can dag gi yang de lta bu nyid kho nar rtogs par 'gyur te rgyu med pa'i shes pa yin par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i chos can dag gi yang de lta bu nyid kho nar rtogs par 'gyur te rgyu med pa'i shes pa yin par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it would be just like the cognition that has no cause, because there would be no difference between them.

original: yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par la ltos pa'i lus ni sems kyi rgyu yin la yongs su gyur pa gcig pa'i phyir skyed par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par la ltos pa'i lus ni sems kyi rgyu yin la yongs su gyur pa gcig pa'i phyir skyed par byed pa yin te /
translated: The body that depends on the transformation is the cause of the mind, and because it is the same transformation, it is the producer.

original: shi ba la de med pa'i phyir skyed byed ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: shi ba la de med pa'i phyir skyed byed ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: But because it does not exist at death, it is not the producer.

original: 'dis ni yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the transformation.

original: dbugs bzhin du yongs su gyur pa yang 'jig rten pha rol med na dang po yang mi 'gyur ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: dbugs bzhin du yongs su gyur pa yang 'jig rten pha rol med na dang po yang mi 'gyur ba kho na yin te /
translated: If there is no other world, the transformation would not occur in the beginning, just like the breath.üîΩBecause there would be no cause.

original: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught:

original: yongs su gyur pa'i rim pa de'ang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa'i rim pa de'ang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That transformation would also be like that.

original: da bzhin du de'i khyad par med pa yang rnam shes kyi khyad par gyi rgyur mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: da bzhin du de'i khyad par med pa yang rnam shes kyi khyad par gyi rgyur mi 'gyur te /
translated: Just like that, the body that is not different from it would not be the cause of the transformation of consciousness.

original: lus @287b la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro khyad par yin na yang lus tsam las mi 'byung ba'i phyir slar yang khyad par rtogs pa yin na thug pa med par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: lus @287b la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro khyad par yin na yang lus tsam las mi 'byung ba'i phyir slar yang khyad par rtogs pa yin na thug pa med par 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: Because there is no difference in the body. If there were a difference, it would not arise from the body alone. If you say that the difference is understood again, there would be an infinite regress.üîΩ

original: lus khyad med phyir de yi yang //
analyzed: lus khyad med phyir de yi yang //
translated: Because there is no difference in the body. Even if there were a difference, it would not arise from the body alone. If you again understand the difference, there would be an infinite regress.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated in the line:üîΩBecause there is no difference in the body, there is no difference in its transformation.

original: yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par med na rnam shes kyi khyad par 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par med na rnam shes kyi khyad par 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: If there is no difference in the transformation, you do not assert a difference in consciousness.

original: de rgyu med pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: de rgyu med pa nyid yin na /
translated: If it has no cause,

original: rnam shes kyang rgyu med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam shes kyang rgyu med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then consciousness itself would be without cause.

original: de bzhin du yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par yang lus kyi khyad par med na mi 'byung bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par yang lus kyi khyad par med na mi 'byung bar bstan pa ni /
translated: Similarly, if there is no difference in the body, the difference in transformation does not occur. This is stated in the line:

original: ji ltar yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par med kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yongs su gyur pa la khyad par yin na ni /
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su gyur pa'i khyad par med kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yongs su gyur pa la khyad par yin na ni /
translated: ‚ÄúJust as, even though there is no difference in transformation,‚Äù and so on. If the transformation itself is different,

original: rtsub pa dang cig shos nyid du mthong ba yin la de bzhin du lus la khyad par med kyang de'i yongs su gyur par 'gyur ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: rtsub pa dang cig shos nyid du mthong ba yin la de bzhin du lus la khyad par med kyang de'i yongs su gyur par 'gyur ba ma yin nam snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: and the other is seen to be rough. In the same way, although there is no difference in the body, is it not thought that there is no transformation of it?

original: gal te 'o ma la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te 'o ma la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If milk and so on are the same,

original: 'o ma gnyis dus mtshungs par gzhag pa kha bas dro bar mtshungs pa ni yongs su gyur par mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin gyi lus gnyis dus mtshungs par gnas pa la sogs pa yin yang rnam shes yongs su gyur pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o ma gnyis dus mtshungs par gzhag pa kha bas dro bar mtshungs pa ni yongs su gyur par mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin gyi lus gnyis dus mtshungs par gnas pa la sogs pa yin yang rnam shes yongs su gyur pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: when two milks are placed at the same time and heated by the same fire, they become the same in transformation. But even though two bodies exist at the same time, etc., the transformation of consciousness is not the same,

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rnam shes mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gzhan dang gzhan pa'i rnam shes mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because other consciousnesses with different characteristics are seen.

original: de'i mi mnyam pa'i dpe yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i mi mnyam pa'i dpe yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The example of its inequality is taught:

original: 'o ma mtshungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas mtshungs pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ngag gcig yin no //
analyzed: 'o ma mtshungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas mtshungs pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ngag gcig yin no //
translated: If the milk is the same, etc., up to the same.

original: lus nyid ni zhes bya ba ni yongs su gyur pa'i zhes blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: lus nyid ni zhes bya ba ni yongs su gyur pa'i zhes blta bar bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe body itself‚Äù should be viewed as ‚Äúthe transformation.‚Äù

original: gal te lus rnam shes yongs su gyur pa'i rgyu ma yin na gzhan gang yin zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: gal te lus rnam shes yongs su gyur pa'i rgyu ma yin na gzhan gang yin zhes zer ba la /
translated: If the body is not the cause of the transformation of consciousness, what else is?

original: lus mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa dag la rjes su mthun pa goms pa'i bag chags ni rgyu mtshan yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: lus mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa dag la rjes su mthun pa goms pa'i bag chags ni rgyu mtshan yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The cause is the habitual propensities of the concordant evolution of the body, whether similar or dissimilar.üîΩTherefore, the cause of existence is the particular result of that cause.üîΩThe particular result is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar srid pa'i rgyu la de'i khyad par yin na 'bras bu'i khyad par kho na yin par nye bar bsdu ba ni de'i tshogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid ces bya ba ste /üîΩji ltar yod pa'i 'bras bu nyid la ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar srid pa'i rgyu la de'i khyad par yin na 'bras bu'i khyad par kho na yin par nye bar bsdu ba ni de'i tshogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid ces bya ba ste / ji ltar yod pa'i 'bras bu nyid la ste /
translated: The result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.

original: phul du byung ba dang 'grib pa nyid la yod pa'o //üîΩde lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni re re'i nus pa nyid yin na 'ang ngo //
analyzed: phul du byung ba dang 'grib pa nyid la yod pa'o // de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni re re'i nus pa nyid yin na 'ang ngo //
translated: The result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.

original: du ma nyid do zhes bya ba ni cig car mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: du ma nyid do zhes bya ba ni cig car mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The result of the collection is the result of the collection of causes.üîΩThe result of the collection is the result of the

original: de lta na rgyu mtshan gang las @288a * //
analyzed: de lta na rgyu mtshan gang las @288a * //
translated: In that case, on the basis of what reasonüîΩ

original: rnam shes rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: rnam shes rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Why then do the consciousnesses arise in succession?

original: gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the doubt that is expressed in the stanza.

original: rgyu rnam shes ni gcig yin la /
analyzed: rgyu rnam shes ni gcig yin la /
translated: The cause is a single consciousness.

original: de la bsdus pa dang re re'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir de'i phyogs la 'byung ba'i skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: de la bsdus pa dang re re'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir de'i phyogs la 'byung ba'i skyon ma yin no //
translated: Since it is not a conceptualizing consciousness, the error of its being produced in parts does not apply.

original: gcig po de yang gcig gi rgyu yin la dus gzhan la 'byung ba'i rnam shes ni de'i bskyed bya ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig po de yang gcig gi rgyu yin la dus gzhan la 'byung ba'i rnam shes ni de'i bskyed bya ma yin no //
translated: This single consciousness is the cause of the other consciousnesses, but the consciousnesses that arise at other times are not its effects.

original: gang gi phyir de yod pa las skad cig ma dang po kho na la 'byung ba yin skad cig ma gcig la yod pa gcig po kho na du ma la nus pa can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de yod pa las skad cig ma dang po kho na la 'byung ba yin skad cig ma gcig la yod pa gcig po kho na du ma la nus pa can ni ma yin te /
translated: Because it exists, the first moment of consciousness arises. It is not that the single consciousness that exists in the first moment has the power to produce the many moments of consciousness that follow.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag gis ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the relation of invariable concomitance is not established between them.

original: rgyu gcig pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu yod par gdon mi za ba ma yin nam de'i phyir snga na med pa'i phyir rtag tu bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu gcig pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu yod par gdon mi za ba ma yin nam de'i phyir snga na med pa'i phyir rtag tu bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Is it not the case that the effect of a single cause is invariably present when the cause is present? Therefore, the effect would be eternal, because it would not exist prior to the cause.

original: 'di ci mig gnyis btsums nas rgol ba yin nam gang gi phyir 'bras bu'i shes pa ma skyes pa nus pa can gzhan las skye ba yin la de'i gnas skabs su 'di'i 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ci mig gnyis btsums nas rgol ba yin nam gang gi phyir 'bras bu'i shes pa ma skyes pa nus pa can gzhan las skye ba yin la de'i gnas skabs su 'di'i 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
translated: Because the nonarisen resultant consciousness arises from another that possesses potentiality, and at that time it is not the effect of that,

original: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has no cause.üîΩTherefore, how could it be that it is not previously existent?üîΩWhen it arises, it arises from that, so how could it be permanent?

original: de'i phyir ji ltar snga na med pa ma yin de skyes na de las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ji ltar rtag tu bar 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni /üîΩrnam shes nus pa nges pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar snga na med pa ma yin de skyes na de las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ji ltar rtag tu bar 'gyur zhes bstan pa ni / rnam shes nus pa nges pa'i phyir //
translated: To explain this, he says:

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because consciousness is ascertained to possess potentiality.

original: skad cig ma'i rnam shes gcig ni shes pa gcig skyed pa kho na la nus pa can du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma'i rnam shes gcig ni shes pa gcig skyed pa kho na la nus pa can du rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag rtogs pa yin te /
translated: One moment of consciousness is ascertained to possess the potentiality to produce only one consciousness, because one can understand that it is present when the other is absent.

original: gzhan gyi skyed byed ma yin no zhes bya bar nges pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi skyed byed ma yin no zhes bya bar nges pa'o //
translated: It is ascertained that it is not the producer of another.

original: 'grel pa mdzad pa ni me la sogs pa bzhin du 'bras bu gzhan du mi 'thad par rtogs pa'i nus pas rjes su mthun pa'i bag chags kyi rnam shes mthong ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni ;
analyzed: 'grel pa mdzad pa ni me la sogs pa bzhin du 'bras bu gzhan du mi 'thad par rtogs pa'i nus pas rjes su mthun pa'i bag chags kyi rnam shes mthong ba kho na yin par bstan pa ni ;
translated: The author of the commentary explains that the power of understanding that it is not tenable for the effect to be different from the cause is the seeing of consciousness that is compatible with the latent impressions.

original: nus pa nges pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nus pa nges pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The line ‚Äúthe power that is ascertained‚Äù teaches this.

original: nus pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: nus pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The second characteristic of the power is taught.

original: chags pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: chags pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The line ‚Äúthe specific desire‚Äù teaches this.

original: de yang shes pa gzhan 'byung ba la gnod pa kho nar mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang shes pa gzhan 'byung ba la gnod pa kho nar mthong ba yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is seen that the arising of another consciousness is only impaired.

original: bag chags dang rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba bshad pa ni /
analyzed: bag chags dang rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of ‚Äúcompatible with the latent impressions‚Äù is as follows.

original: bag chags brtan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bag chags brtan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The line ‚Äúthe stable latent impressions‚Äù teaches this.

original: 'ba' zhig gam zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gam zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The line ‚Äúalone‚Äù teaches this.

original: gnyid log pa la sogs pas sems rgyun chad pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyid log pa la sogs pas sems rgyun chad pa yin no //
translated: Sleep and so on interrupt the continuum of the mind.

original: de'i tshe rnam rtog kho na sad pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam rtog kho na sad pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: At that time, only conceptualization is active, not anything else.

original: chags pa'i khyad par ram gnas pa'i nges pa zhes bya ba 'di'i yul bstan pa ni /
analyzed: chags pa'i khyad par ram gnas pa'i nges pa zhes bya ba 'di'i yul bstan pa ni /
translated: The line ‚Äúthe specific desire or the certainty of the location‚Äù teaches the object of this.

original: sngon por mthong ba'i mtshungs @288b pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni /
analyzed: sngon por mthong ba'i mtshungs @288b pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni /
translated: The immediately preceding condition for the perception of blue is theüîΩawakening of the latent propensities that are concordant with the arising of

original: sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba la rjes su mthun pa'i bag chags sad pa ni de la chags pas de las 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: sngon po'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba la rjes su mthun pa'i bag chags sad pa ni de la chags pas de las 'byung ba yin no //
translated: the thought of blue, since it arises from that attachment.üîΩ‚Äú

original: 'ba' zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di la nyams su myong bar 'dzin pa ni /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gam zhes bya ba 'di la nyams su myong bar 'dzin pa ni /
translated: Only‚Äù means that the apprehension of experience isüîΩ‚Äúlike this.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúüîΩThe immediately preceding condition‚Äù or ‚Äúthe awakening of that which is

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen nam rjes su mthun pa sad pa zhes bya ba 'di la spyod pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag rkyen las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen nam rjes su mthun pa sad pa zhes bya ba 'di la spyod pa ni mtshungs pa de ma thag rkyen las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: concordant‚Äù means that the activity is ‚Äúfrom the immediately preceding

original: nye ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nye ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: condition.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúüîΩProximity‚Äù means that the perception of blue is ‚Äúproximate to the thought of

original: sngon po mthong ba ni sngon po ni rnam rtog pa dang nye ba zhes bya bas chags pa'i khyad par bstang pa yin no /
analyzed: sngon po mthong ba ni sngon po ni rnam rtog pa dang nye ba zhes bya bas chags pa'i khyad par bstang pa yin no /
translated: blue.‚Äù This indicates the difference in attachment.üîΩ‚Äú

original: bar du gcod pa ni bar chad la sogs 'di nyid 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: bar du gcod pa ni bar chad la sogs 'di nyid 'chad pa ni /
translated: Obstruction‚Äù means an impediment. This is explained as follows:

original: rnam par shes pa bar du gcod pa'i bag chags gang dag yin pa de dag gi rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bar du gcod pa'i bag chags gang dag yin pa de dag gi rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The conceptualization of those latent propensities that obstruct consciousness.

original: gzhan gyi shes bya nas skabs yin pa'i phyir rnam rtog las so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi shes bya nas skabs yin pa'i phyir rnam rtog las so //
translated: From conceptualization, because it is the object of another‚Äôs knowledge.

original: ci las shes she na /
analyzed: ci las shes she na /
translated: What is known?

original: chags pa'i yul yin pas des bar du chod pa'i phyir de rnams skye ba min zhes par sbyar ro //
analyzed: chags pa'i yul yin pas des bar du chod pa'i phyir de rnams skye ba min zhes par sbyar ro //
translated: Because it is the object of attachment, it is said that they do not arise due to being obstructed by that.

original: de'i phyir de ltar chags pa'i khyad par gyi nges pa las gcig gam de med na du ma yang sems gcig las kyang sems skye bar 'gyur ba yin gyi nus pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i nus pa la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba nye bar bsdu ba
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar chags pa'i khyad par gyi nges pa las gcig gam de med na du ma yang sems gcig las kyang sems skye bar 'gyur ba yin gyi nus pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i nus pa la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba nye bar bsdu ba
translated: Therefore, in this way, from the ascertainment of the particularity of attachment, either one or many minds arise from a single mind, but not from the power of the nature of potentiality.

original: ni / de bas na rnam par shes pa las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ni / de bas na rnam par shes pa las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is said ‚Äúfrom consciousness.‚Äù

original: shes pa gcig lan cig skye bzhin pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa gcig lan cig skye bzhin pa ni /
translated: A single cognition arises at one time.

original: rgyu gcig par go bar byed na du ma'i ngo bo'i lus la mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i go bar byed pa yin zhes bya ba de dag tsam la tshad ma 'jug pa ma yin nam de rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ci las yin /
analyzed: rgyu gcig par go bar byed na du ma'i ngo bo'i lus la mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i go bar byed pa yin zhes bya ba de dag tsam la tshad ma 'jug pa ma yin nam de rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ci las yin /
translated: If it is understood to be a single cause, it is understood to be a cause that is of a different nature from the body.  Are not valid cognitions applied to just those?  What is the basis for calling it consciousness?

original: yod kyang yod pa kho na yin te cig car shes pa mi skye ba ni yid kyi rtags yin gyi nang gi chos bde ba la sogs pa rnams la ni rgyu med par skyes pa skye ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /üîΩdon gzhan chags pas nus pa med //
analyzed: yod kyang yod pa kho na yin te cig car shes pa mi skye ba ni yid kyi rtags yin gyi nang gi chos bde ba la sogs pa rnams la ni rgyu med par skyes pa skye ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa la / don gzhan chags pas nus pa med //
translated: Even though it exists, it is only existent.  The non-arising of consciousness simultaneously is the sign of the mind.  It is not that internal phenomena such as pleasure arise without a cause.

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: The powerless one is attached to another object.

original: snga ma'i shes pa kho na shes pa gcig gi dus na shes pa gzhan mi 'byung bar nus par rtogs pa yin gyi yid kyi ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snga ma'i shes pa kho na shes pa gcig gi dus na shes pa gzhan mi 'byung bar nus par rtogs pa yin gyi yid kyi ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The former consciousness itself is understood to be the power that prevents another consciousness from arising at the time of a single consciousness.  It is not the mind. This is the meaning.

original: shes pa gcig dus gcig gi tshe 'byung ba nges pa can de ma thag pa gcig gi ngo bo'i rnam shes go bar byed pa ma yin nam de yang rang gi rgyu de lta bu yin la de yang de lta bu'i yin la de yang de lta bu'i
analyzed: shes pa gcig dus gcig gi tshe 'byung ba nges pa can de ma thag pa gcig gi ngo bo'i rnam shes go bar byed pa ma yin nam de yang rang gi rgyu de lta bu yin la de yang de lta bu'i yin la de yang de lta bu'i
translated: But is it not certain that a single consciousness arises at a single time? And is it not the case that the nature of the immediately preceding consciousness is understood from that? And its cause is like that, and that is like that, and that is like that.

original: yin pa ni ji srid dang po'i rnam shes ni lus gcig las sam du ma @289a * //
analyzed: yin pa ni ji srid dang po'i rnam shes ni lus gcig las sam du ma @289a * //
translated: As long as the first consciousness arises from the nature of the collection of a single body or many bodies,

original: las kyang rung tshogs pa'i ngo bo las skye ba de skye ba de srid du go ba yin gyi dus gzhan na 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: las kyang rung tshogs pa'i ngo bo las skye ba de skye ba de srid du go ba yin gyi dus gzhan na 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: it is understood that it arises from that. It does not arise at another time,

original: de la ltos nas de skyed byed ma yin pa'i phyir dang dang po shes pa skye ba kho na la nus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la ltos nas de skyed byed ma yin pa'i phyir dang dang po shes pa skye ba kho na la nus pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in dependence on that, it is not a producer, and it is only at the time of the arising of the first consciousness that it has the ability.

original: de'i phyir shes pa thams cad de kho na bzhin 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa thams cad de kho na bzhin 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, all consciousnesses would be just like that,

original: nus pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar thal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar thal bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: because there would be no difference in their potential.

original: gal te lus nyid las zhes bya ba ste yang gi sgras ni shes pa gcig skye ba yang ngo //
analyzed: gal te lus nyid las zhes bya ba ste yang gi sgras ni shes pa gcig skye ba yang ngo //
translated: If it is from the body itself, and the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that a single cognition arises.

original: gal te shes pa du ma yin na ji ltar shes pa gcig yin rgyu du ma nyid la 'bras bu mang po mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa du ma yin na ji ltar shes pa gcig yin rgyu du ma nyid la 'bras bu mang po mthong ba'i phyir ro snyam du sems na /
translated: If there are many cognitions, how can there be a single cognition? Because many causes are seen to have a single effect.

original: yang de la zer ba ni /
analyzed: yang de la zer ba ni /

original: dper na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa du ma zhes bya ba ste /

original: de zer ba ni /
analyzed: de zer ba ni /

original: gal te lus las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te lus las zhes bya ba'o //

original: lan cig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: lan cig ces bya ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú At one time‚Äù means

original: dus gzhan na mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni don to //
analyzed: dus gzhan na mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni don to //
translated: that it does not arise at another time.

original: 'di yang rang yin la rigs kyang yin la zhes bya ba'i shes pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di yang rang yin la rigs kyang yin la zhes bya ba'i shes pa'i nus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means the potential of the cognition that is both itself and its type.

original: dang po skyed byed kyi lus dus phyis ngo shes pa las rjes su 'jug par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po skyed byed kyi lus dus phyis ngo shes pa las rjes su 'jug par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen that the body that first produces it later engages in recognition.

original: ji ltar skyed byed ma yin pa'am de'i tshe kho na de'i bskyed bya med pa ji ltar yin te bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ji ltar skyed byed ma yin pa'am de'i tshe kho na de'i bskyed bya med pa ji ltar yin te bstan pa ni /
translated: How could it not be the producer? Or how could it not be its product at that very time? This is explained as follows:

original: des na lus kyi nus pa ni /
analyzed: des na lus kyi nus pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the potency of the body

original: des na lus kyi nus pa ni //üîΩzhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des na lus kyi nus pa ni // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, the potency of the bodyüîΩis the cause of the arising of consciousness.

original: lus kyang skyed byed yin la rnam shes kyang yin zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel ba ni /
analyzed: lus kyang skyed byed yin la rnam shes kyang yin zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel ba ni /
translated: The commentary explains that the body is the producer and consciousness is the producer.

original: gal te lus las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te lus las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If the body is the cause of consciousness,üîΩthen when it repeatedly produces consciousness, it is the producer of consciousness at the first moment, because there is no difference.üîΩBut if it is the producer of consciousness at the first moment, then it is the producer of consciousness at the second moment, and so on.

original: gang gi tshe yang dang yang du skyed par byed pa de'i tshe khyad par med pa'i phyir dang po'i tshe kho na skyed par byed pa kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩ'on te yang dang yang du skyed par byed pa yin te /üîΩbskyed bya'i shes pas nye bar gnod pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa ni /

translated: If you think that it is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on,

original: 'on te rnam par shes pa des zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te rnam par shes pa des zhes bya ba ste /
translated: then if consciousness is produced by the body,üîΩit is not tenable that consciousness is produced by consciousness.üîΩIf you think that the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment and consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on,üîΩthen if the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment, it is not tenable that consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on.üîΩIf you think that the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment and consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on,
