translated: then if the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment, it is not tenable that consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on.üîΩIf you think that the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment and consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on,üîΩthen if the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment, it is not tenable that consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on.üîΩIf you think that the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment and consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on,üîΩthen if the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment, it is not tenable that consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on.üîΩIf you think that the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment and consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on,üîΩthen if the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment, it is not tenable that consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on.üîΩIf you think that the body is the producer of consciousness at the first moment and consciousness is the producer of consciousness at the second moment and so on,üîΩthen if

original: lan ni don 'di zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni don 'di zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The answer is: this is the meaning.

original: 'bras bu'i rgyu'i nus pa la nye bar gnod pa'i'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rgyu'i nus pa la nye bar gnod pa'i'o //
translated: The potency of the cause of the effect is impaired.

original: gang yul du byas pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang yul du byas pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is the object?

original: rnam shes nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam shes nyid las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Consciousness itself.

original: tshad ma gnyi ga las grub pa'i rnam shes ni rnam shes nyid las so //
analyzed: tshad ma gnyi ga las grub pa'i rnam shes ni rnam shes nyid las so //
translated: Consciousness is established by both valid cognitions.

original: dper na 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs na rnam shes nyid las rnam shes yin pa ni de'i 'du byed kyi @289b rjes su byed pa'i phyir yin la /
analyzed: dper na 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs na rnam shes nyid las rnam shes yin pa ni de'i 'du byed kyi @289b rjes su byed pa'i phyir yin la /
translated: For example, in the state of life, consciousness is from consciousness itself, because it conforms to the formative forces of that.

original: de bzhin du dang po'i gnas skabs la yang yin gyi lus las ni ma yin te 'gal ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i lus nyid las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dang po'i gnas skabs la yang yin gyi lus las ni ma yin te 'gal ba'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i lus nyid las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: In the same way, it is also in the initial state, but not from the body, because it is a contradictory effect. In order to demonstrate this, he says: from the body itself, which is devoid of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa du ma skye zhing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa du ma skye zhing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Consciousness arises from many causes.

original: gcig gam du ma la yang ma gus pa'i bsam pas so //
analyzed: gcig gam du ma la yang ma gus pa'i bsam pas so //
translated: With a disrespectful attitude toward one or many.

original: shes pa du ma gzhan dang gzhan skyed par byed pa ni nus pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir dus gcig las shes pa du ma skyed par byed pa yin par dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa du ma gzhan dang gzhan skyed par byed pa ni nus pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir dus gcig las shes pa du ma skyed par byed pa yin par dgongs pa'o //
translated: Since there is no difference in the potency of the many consciousnesses that are produced, it is thought that many consciousnesses are produced at one time.

original: 'bras bu rgyu rnams kyi nus pa la nye bar gnod pa ma byas kyang gcig gis byas pa la gzhan yal bar 'dug par mthong ba yin no snyam du sems pa la rgyu rnams rtog pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu rgyu rnams kyi nus pa la nye bar gnod pa ma byas kyang gcig gis byas pa la gzhan yal bar 'dug par mthong ba yin no snyam du sems pa la rgyu rnams rtog pa dang ldan pa ni 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: But no cause is ever seen to be endowed with the conception that it is the producer of an effect, even though it does not interfere with the potency of the cause.

original: gang gi gang las zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i lnga pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi gang las zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i lnga pa yin no //
translated: The fifth case, the ablative, is used in the phrase ‚Äúfrom that, that arises.‚Äù

original: gal te yang 'bras bus nye bar gnod pa ni gzhan la mi snang yang 'di nyid la cis mi srid pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: gal te yang 'bras bus nye bar gnod pa ni gzhan la mi snang yang 'di nyid la cis mi srid pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If you think that although the interference of the effect is not seen in another, why is it not possible in this case?

original: 'on te brgya la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te brgya la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The response is ‚ÄúEven if it were possible.‚Äù

original: lan ni lus las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni lus las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is ‚ÄúThe body.‚Äù

original: lus ni shes pa las skyed byed nyid du nges ba yin na phyi ma'i dus su skyed par mi byed pas nye bar gnod pa srid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus ni shes pa las skyed byed nyid du nges ba yin na phyi ma'i dus su skyed par mi byed pas nye bar gnod pa srid par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the body were definitely the producer of consciousness, it would not be possible for it to be damaged, since it would not produce consciousness at a later time.

original: rnam shes du ma zhes bya ba ni skyed byed nyid tsam du dgongs pas so //
analyzed: rnam shes du ma zhes bya ba ni skyed byed nyid tsam du dgongs pas so //
translated: Many consciousnesses means that it is intended that it is merely the producer.

original: du ma 'dzin pa ni gtso bo mi byed pas so //
analyzed: du ma 'dzin pa ni gtso bo mi byed pas so //
translated: Many are not apprehended because it is not the principal.

original: dogs par 'gyur ba la /
analyzed: dogs par 'gyur ba la /
translated: In response to this doubt,

original: la lar zhes bya ba ni dus phyis shes pa nyid la shes pa yin no //
analyzed: la lar zhes bya ba ni dus phyis shes pa nyid la shes pa yin no //
translated: in some cases means that consciousness itself is consciousness at a later time.

original: rgyu mtshan ni lus skyed par byed pa'i nus pa can du nges pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni lus skyed par byed pa'i nus pa can du nges pa'o //
translated: The reason is that it is definitely the potential to produce the body.

original: lus bzhin du rnam shes kyi yang ci las de nges pa yin zhes pa la /
analyzed: lus bzhin du rnam shes kyi yang ci las de nges pa yin zhes pa la /
translated: Just as with the body, why is consciousness definitely that?üîΩIn response to this,

original: de'i phyogs su lhung ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyogs su lhung ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said that it falls into that category.

original: goms pa'i 'du byed pa'i khyad par gyis nges par rnam shes kyi skyed byed yin la gcig skyed par byed pa 'di yin par nyams su myong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: goms pa'i 'du byed pa'i khyad par gyis nges par rnam shes kyi skyed byed yin la gcig skyed par byed pa 'di yin par nyams su myong ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is definitely the producer of consciousness due to the specific formative force of habituation, and it is experienced that this produces one.

original: dbang po du ma'i bskyed bya shes pa du ma yin par mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: dbang po du ma'i bskyed bya shes pa du ma yin par mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: Don‚Äôt you see that the many cognitions are produced by the many sense faculties?

original: de bzhin du lus kyi bskyed byar yang 'gyur snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du lus kyi bskyed byar yang 'gyur snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: In the same way, the body also would be produced by the many sense faculties.

original: brjod bya ma yin nam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brjod bya ma yin nam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is meant by ‚Äúis it not so?‚Äù

original: dbang po yang snga ma'i rnam shes dang bral na rnam shes kyi rgyu ma yin te rnam shes kyi 'di byed pa med na med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde ni gcig gam du 'am yang rung nus pa yod pa dang med pa dag gis @290a * //
analyzed: dbang po yang snga ma'i rnam shes dang bral na rnam shes kyi rgyu ma yin te rnam shes kyi 'di byed pa med na med pa'i phyir ro // de ni gcig gam du 'am yang rung nus pa yod pa dang med pa dag gis @290a * //
translated: And if the sense faculty is devoid of the previous cognition, it is not the cause of cognition, because the cognition does not exist without it.

original: rnam shes skyed par byed pa yin par brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rnam shes skyed par byed pa yin par brjod pa ni /
translated: Whether it is one or many, it is said that the sense faculty produces cognition by means of its presence or absence.

original: bden te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bden te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is true, as the verse says,

original: de de ltar rnam shes kyi nges par rnam shes gzhan gyi 'du byed pa'i rjes su byed na /
analyzed: de de ltar rnam shes kyi nges par rnam shes gzhan gyi 'du byed pa'i rjes su byed na /
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is so, then the sense faculty would follow the other cognition.‚Äù

original: 'jig rten pha rol med na mi srid pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol med na mi srid pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: If there is no other world, it would be impossible.

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is meant by ‚Äúin the other.‚Äù

original: lus rgyu nyid yin na gsal ba mang po kho na yin te /
analyzed: lus rgyu nyid yin na gsal ba mang po kho na yin te /
translated: If the body is the cause, then there would be many manifestations.

original: de'i rtag tu nye ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i rtag tu nye ba yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The response to that is:

original: des na lus de zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na lus de zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore, that body‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: nur nur po'i ngo bo'i lus shes pa'i skyed byed ma yin nam /
analyzed: nur nur po'i ngo bo'i lus shes pa'i skyed byed ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the body in the form of an embryo the producer of consciousness?

original: gzhan ni de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni de'i skyed byed ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni de'i skyed byed ma yin no //
translated: The other, which is dissimilar to that, is not its producer.

original: de'i phyir nus pa dang ldan pa'i lus ni ldog pa ci las yin zhes bya ba rigs pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir nus pa dang ldan pa'i lus ni ldog pa ci las yin zhes bya ba rigs pa yin snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to think, ‚ÄúFrom what is the body endowed with potential turned away?‚Äù

original: 'on te lus de'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te lus de'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOr, that body‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: nur nur po dang / mtshan nyid mi mthun pa skyed byed ma yin na /
analyzed: nur nur po dang / mtshan nyid mi mthun pa skyed byed ma yin na /
translated: If the embryo, which is dissimilar, is not the producer,

original: de dang lhan cig ma bral ba'i rnam shes su mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig ma bral ba'i rnam shes su mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: it is shown that consciousness is not inseparable from it.

original: gal te dang po'i lus nyid kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te dang po'i lus nyid kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIf the very first body‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.

original: lan cig nye bar len pa nyid du 'bras bu'i khyad par la nges na de nyid la lhan cig byed pa nyid ni de dang 'gal ba nyid du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: lan cig nye bar len pa nyid du 'bras bu'i khyad par la nges na de nyid la lhan cig byed pa nyid ni de dang 'gal ba nyid du mi 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: If the result is determined to be a particular appropriation, then it is shown that it is not contradictory for it to be a co-originator with that.

original: gal te lus zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te lus zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is the body,üîΩ

original: ba lang gi lci ba dang autpala'i rtsa ba'i dbye ba bzhin du lus dang rnam shes las byung ba'i rnam shes kyi dbye ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ba lang gi lci ba dang autpala'i rtsa ba'i dbye ba bzhin du lus dang rnam shes las byung ba'i rnam shes kyi dbye ba yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If you think that consciousness arises from the body just as the difference between cowdung and lotus root arises from the difference between the body and consciousness,

original: rnam shes dag gi dbye ba ni goms pa'i bskyed pa bya'i khyad par nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rnam shes dag gi dbye ba ni goms pa'i bskyed pa bya'i khyad par nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: then we reply that the difference between consciousnesses is not due to a difference in the nature of the body, but is due to the imprints of habit.

original: gsal ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse says, ‚ÄúThe difference is due to the difference in the body, etc.‚Äù

original: sems pa lus ni nye bar len pa nyid ma yin na sems kyi 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug par nges pas lhan cig byed pa nyid med pa la yang rgyu mtshan mtshungs pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: sems pa lus ni nye bar len pa nyid ma yin na sems kyi 'du byed pa'i rjes su 'jug par nges pas lhan cig byed pa nyid med pa la yang rgyu mtshan mtshungs pa yin no zhes zer ba ni /
translated: If you think that the body is not the appropriator of consciousness, but that the body is the cause of consciousness because it is the basis of consciousness, then we reply that the body is not the cause of consciousness because it is not the cause of consciousness in the way that the eye is the cause of visual consciousness.

original: khyed kyi ltar na yang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyed kyi ltar na yang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The verse says, ‚ÄúThe body is not the cause of consciousness.‚ÄùüîΩIf you think that the body is the cause of consciousness because it is the basis of consciousness, we reply that it is not the cause of consciousness because it is not the cause of consciousness in the way that the eye is the cause of visual consciousness.

original: rten min phyir ni nye bar len pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten min phyir ni nye bar len pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The verse says, ‚ÄúBecause it is not the basis.‚Äù

original: lhan cig byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir lus la brten pa ma yin pa'i sems ni lus med kyang rnam par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i phyogs la khas len pa yin par bstan pa ni /üîΩsems kyi rgyu ni gnas pa'i rgyu ste /üîΩgnas pa ni rgyun ma chad pa yin pa de'i rgyu ni las kyi ming can te de ni lus kyi rgyu yin no //üîΩde'i lus kyi rgyu ni skye mched lnga'o //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir lus la brten pa ma yin pa'i sems ni lus med kyang rnam par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i phyogs la khas len pa yin par bstan pa ni / sems kyi rgyu ni gnas pa'i rgyu ste / gnas pa ni rgyun ma chad pa yin pa de'i rgyu ni las kyi ming can te de ni lus kyi rgyu yin no // de'i lus kyi rgyu ni skye mched lnga'o //
translated: The mind that is not supported by the body, because it is not a co-operating condition, is established without a body.üîΩThe cause of the mind is the cause of its duration.üîΩThe cause of duration is the cause of its continuity. That cause is called karma, and that is the cause of the body.üîΩThe cause of that body is the five sense-spheres.üîΩ

original: tshe 'di nyid skye mched lnga'i srid pa 'di las gzhan pa'i lus skye ba gzhan la 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni lus gzhan yin la de'i bskyed pa'i lus la rgyu yin no //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid skye mched lnga'i srid pa 'di las gzhan pa'i lus skye ba gzhan la 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni lus gzhan yin la de'i bskyed pa'i lus la rgyu yin no //
translated: The body that arises in another life, which is different from this body that is the five aggregates, is the other body, and the cause of that body is the present body.

original: yang na yan lag can nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyogs la 'ba' zhig gnas par dam bcas nas phyogs gzhan la de med par bstan pa ni /üîΩde nyid kyi gyis gang gi tshe yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yang na yan lag can nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyogs la 'ba' zhig gnas par dam bcas nas phyogs gzhan la de med par bstan pa ni / de nyid kyi gyis gang gi tshe yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Or else, in the case of the position that there is no whole, the opponent‚Äôs position is refuted by showing that it does not exist in the other case.

original: yang gi sgra ni khyad par gyi tshig go //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni khyad par gyi tshig go //
translated: In that case, the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the line ‚ÄúAlso, the body that arises in another life‚Äù is a word of distinction.üîΩThe meaning of the line ‚ÄúAlso, the body that arises in another life‚Äù is as follows:

original: 'di la yang bag chags la gnas pa'i lam gyi ngo bo ni /
analyzed: 'di la yang bag chags la gnas pa'i lam gyi ngo bo ni /
translated: The essence of the path that is based on predispositions

original: de dang lhan cig brjod pa can du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig brjod pa can du byed pa yin no //
translated: is expressed together with that.

original: nur nur po ni srid pa gzhan la 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: nur nur po ni srid pa gzhan la 'byung ba'o //
translated: The kalala is the body that arises in another life.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni tshe 'di ba'i skye mched lnga bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni tshe 'di ba'i skye mched lnga bstan pa yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that the five aggregates of this life are also included.

original: 'byung rngub dbang po blo dag ni //
analyzed: 'byung rngub dbang po blo dag ni //
translated: Inhalation and exhalation, the sense faculties, and the mind

original: lus nyid 'ba' zhig las skyes min //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus nyid 'ba' zhig las skyes min //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: do not arise from the body alone.

original: mngon par phyogs pa'i bya ba'i dngos po bstan nas der gtod pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mngon par phyogs pa'i bya ba'i dngos po bstan nas der gtod pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Having taught the thing that is the activity of manifestation, he teaches the directing of the mind to that:

analyzed: de thob pa ni lus kyi rgyu 'ba' zhig la zhes bya ba'o //

original: dgag par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dgag par bstan pa ni /

analyzed: de yan lag du mi 'gyur na zhes bya ba'o //

original: 'ba' zhig gnas pa'i sems bag chags la gnas pa'i skye mched lnga'i dbang gis dus phyis lus dang bcas par 'byung bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gnas pa'i sems bag chags la gnas pa'i skye mched lnga'i dbang gis dus phyis lus dang bcas par 'byung bar bstan pa ni /
translated: the mind that is only abiding, abiding in the latent impressions, later arises together with the body, by the power of the five sense-spheres.

original: lus gzhan skye ba la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lus gzhan skye ba la ni zhes bya ba'o //

analyzed: sems kyi ngo bo'i las kyang skye ba phyi ma'i lus ma mthong na ji ltar rgya yin par rtogs snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: One might think, ‚ÄúIf the mind does not see the body of the next birth, how can it be the cause of that?‚Äù

original: de'i yan lag gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i yan lag gi zhes bya ba'o //

original: 'di ni las kyi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni las kyi'o //

analyzed: de dag dgag pa la mi dmigs pa ni 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'o //

analyzed: dpe dang don gyis yul gyi khyad par gyi dpe brjod pa ni bum pa dang sgra'i zhes bya bya'o ;
translated: The example of the particular object, by example and meaning, is the pot and sound.

original: yul dang rgyu'i khyad par la sogs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: yul dang rgyu'i khyad par la sogs pa rnams ni /
translated: The difference in object, cause, etc.

original: khyad par byed pa nyid la gtan tshigs nyid yin te /
analyzed: khyad par byed pa nyid la gtan tshigs nyid yin te /
translated: are the reason for the difference in the effect.

original: dbang po gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba la gegs med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba la gegs med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Because there is no obstruction to the connection with another sense faculty.

original: dbang po snga ma zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dbang po snga ma zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is indicated by the words ‚Äúthe previous sense faculty.‚Äù

original: rang rigs la ni rang gi rgyud las byung ba rnams la ste /
analyzed: rang rigs la ni rang gi rgyud las byung ba rnams la ste /
translated: Those that arise from one‚Äôs own continuum in one‚Äôs own class

original: rgyud @291b gzhan gyi dbang po la mtshams sbyor ba ma yin na rang gi rgyud la mtshams kyi sbyor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyud @291b gzhan gyi dbang po la mtshams sbyor ba ma yin na rang gi rgyud la mtshams kyi sbyor ba ma yin no //
translated: are not connected to another continuum, and if they are not connected to another continuum, they are not connected to one‚Äôs own continuum.

original: gang gi phyir me ni me gzhan gyi bskyed bya'i du ba skyed par mi byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir me ni me gzhan gyi bskyed bya'i du ba skyed par mi byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Because fire does not fail to produce smoke, which is to be produced by another fire.

original: 'jig rten pha rol du byung ba'i dbang po ni 'jig rten pha rol gzhan las 'byung ba'i rang gi rgyud kyi skyed byed du ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol du byung ba'i dbang po ni 'jig rten pha rol gzhan las 'byung ba'i rang gi rgyud kyi skyed byed du ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The sense faculty that arises in another world is not the producer of that which arises in another world in another continuum.üîΩIf you say that, then NƒÅgƒÅrjuna says:

original: 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'gyur ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because a change is seen.

original: goms pa'i bskyed bya'i dbang po rnams kyi 'gyur ba ste /üîΩg-yer bag can la sogs pa'i khyad par du skye ba dang po la mthong ba'i phyir gzhan las te skye ba snga ma las gzhan te skye ba phyi ma gzhan gyi dbang po rnams 'grub pa nyid ces bya ba gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs
analyzed: goms pa'i bskyed bya'i dbang po rnams kyi 'gyur ba ste / g-yer bag can la sogs pa'i khyad par du skye ba dang po la mthong ba'i phyir gzhan las te skye ba snga ma las gzhan te skye ba phyi ma gzhan gyi dbang po rnams 'grub pa nyid ces bya ba gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir 'tsho ba'i gnas skabs
translated: The faculties that are to be developed through practice are the faculties of the second and subsequent births.üîΩThe faculties of the first birth are produced from other faculties, i.e., from the faculties of the previous birth.üîΩThe faculties of the second birth are produced from the faculties of the first birth.üîΩThus, the faculties of the second birth are established as being dependent on the faculties of the first birth.

original: su 'brel pa 'dzin pa las skye ba'i dang po la rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: su 'brel pa 'dzin pa las skye ba'i dang po la rjes su dpog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In this way, the faculties of the second birth are inferred from the faculties of the first birth, which are perceived.

original: gsal ba'i khyad par las 'brel pa 'dzin pa na de dang 'dra ba la yang 'dzin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gsal ba'i khyad par las 'brel pa 'dzin pa na de dang 'dra ba la yang 'dzin pa yin gyi /
translated: When one grasps the connection between the specific manifestations, one grasps the connection between the similar manifestations.

original: gzhan du na 'bras bu mthong ba nyid la rgyur rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi mthong ba ni nye bar len par mi byed do //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'bras bu mthong ba nyid la rgyur rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu mi mthong ba ni nye bar len par mi byed do //
translated: Otherwise, one would not grasp the connection between the dissimilar manifestations, because one would have to understand the cause from seeing the effect.

original: de lta yin na tha snyad chad par 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de lta yin na tha snyad chad par 'gyur ba yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that if this were so, conventional usage would be interrupted.

original: gsal ba'i khyad par zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gsal ba'i khyad par zhes bya'o //
translated: The specific manifestations are called the ‚Äúconnection.‚Äù

original: de ltar na g-yo ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas skyes pa ni de lta bur gyur pa'i bar gyis 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na g-yo ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas skyes pa ni de lta bur gyur pa'i bar gyis 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin par bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the statement ‚Äúmoving, etc.‚Äù up to ‚Äúarisen in that way‚Äù teaches the apprehension of the connection.

original: de lta bur gyur pa mthong ba las zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa mthong ba las zhes bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Seeing in that way‚Äù is inference.

original: 'on te dbang po ni zhes bya ba ni dbang po gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba nyid kyis gzung ba yin no zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: 'on te dbang po ni zhes bya ba ni dbang po gzhan dang mtshams sbyor ba nyid kyis gzung ba yin no zhes zer ba la /
translated: ‚Äú Or the sense faculty‚Äù is the apprehension by the connection with another sense faculty.

original: gal te de lta na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te de lta na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If it is like that, then.

original: gal te yang dbang po chos can cig yin yang de'i khyad par g-yo ba la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: gal te yang dbang po chos can cig yin yang de'i khyad par g-yo ba la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: Even though the sense faculty is one, its distinctions, such as moving, etc.,

original: goms pa'i bskyed bya ni /
analyzed: goms pa'i bskyed bya ni /
translated: are the products of habituation.

original: skad cig re re zhing tha dad pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: skad cig re re zhing tha dad pa kho na yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement ‚Äúmoment by moment, they are different‚Äù teaches that.

original: g-yo ba la sogs pa goms pa sngon du 'gro ba can zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: g-yo ba la sogs pa goms pa sngon du 'gro ba can zhes bya ba ste /
translated: ‚Äú Moving, etc., preceded by habituation‚Äù is the statement.

original: des na dbugs kyi gnas skabs su zhes bya ba ni g-yo ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa las te /
analyzed: des na dbugs kyi gnas skabs su zhes bya ba ni g-yo ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa las te /
translated: ‚Äú Therefore, in the state of the breath‚Äù is from the nature that is characterized by moving, etc.

original: rang bzhin ma yin na skye ba gzhan dang gzhan gyi dbang po rnams mi 'grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang bzhin ma yin na skye ba gzhan dang gzhan gyi dbang po rnams mi 'grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the other faculties would not be established.

original: skye ba gzhan dang gzhan yang skad cig re re zhing gzhan dang gzhan nyid du 'grel pa mdzad pa bzhed pa yin no //
analyzed: skye ba gzhan dang gzhan yang skad cig re re zhing gzhan dang gzhan nyid du 'grel pa mdzad pa bzhed pa yin no //
translated: The other faculties are also different from one another, and he intends to explain that they are different from one another in each moment.

original: sa la sogs pa bzhin zhes @292a * //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa bzhin zhes @292a * //
translated: Like earth, etc.

original: bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i kham phor la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba tha dad pa yin pa ni /
analyzed: bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i kham phor la sogs pa'i 'gyur ba tha dad pa yin pa ni /
translated: The different transformations of pots, etc., which are the nature of earth, etc.,

original: sa la sogs pa nyid tha dad pa yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa nyid tha dad pa yin gyi shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: are different from earth, etc., but not from consciousness.

original: gal te lus las lan cig blo //
analyzed: gal te lus las lan cig blo //
translated: If the mind arises once from the body,

original: skye zhing phyis ni rang rig las nges pa na zhes rgol ba dang ; lus kyi nus pa ni ci'i phyir na ldog pa yin zhes bya ba la de'i ngo bor khyad par med pa las skyed byed yin na cig car du ma'i skyed byed nyid du thal bar 'gyur bar yang ngo //
analyzed: skye zhing phyis ni rang rig las nges pa na zhes rgol ba dang ; lus kyi nus pa ni ci'i phyir na ldog pa yin zhes bya ba la de'i ngo bor khyad par med pa las skyed byed yin na cig car du ma'i skyed byed nyid du thal bar 'gyur bar yang ngo //
translated: and later it is ascertained from self-awareness, then the opponent says, Why does the potency of the body cease? If it is the producer of what is not different in nature from it, it would absurdly follow that it is the producer of many at once.

original: dbang po la yang lhag par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po la yang lhag par bstan pa ni /
translated: The special teaching on the faculties is:

original: gal te lus las de skye na //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te lus las de skye na // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it arises from the body,üîΩthen it would follow that the body is the cause of the faculties.

original: de nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni ;
analyzed: de nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni ;
translated: This is explained in the commentary:

original: /'on kyang dang po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: /'on kyang dang po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if the body is prior to the faculties,üîΩthen it would follow that the body is the cause of the faculties.

original: lan lhag par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: lan lhag par bstan pa ni /
translated: The special reply is:

original: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur //
translated: The previous consequence would apply.

original: zhes bya ba der rnam par 'chad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba der rnam par 'chad pa ste /
translated: This is explained there:

original: gal te lus las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te lus las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it arises from the body,üîΩthen it would follow that the body is the cause of the faculties.

original: yang na lus las dbang po skye bar khas len pa yin na gnas skabs la sogs pa thal ches pa yin par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa la thal ches pa'i phyir zhes gsungs pa lhag par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: yang na lus las dbang po skye bar khas len pa yin na gnas skabs la sogs pa thal ches pa yin par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa la thal ches pa'i phyir zhes gsungs pa lhag par bstan pa ni /
translated: Or if you accept that the faculties arise from the body, then it would follow that the body is the cause of the faculties because it would follow that the body is the cause of the faculties that are its result. The special teaching on this is:

original: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The previous consequence would apply.üîΩThe previous is the main point.

original: snga ma de nyid gtso bo yin te rtsig pa dang bum pa la sogs pa dang / shi ba'i lus la yang sems med pa'i phyir dbang po med na de'i rgyu de nyid yin te ;
analyzed: snga ma de nyid gtso bo yin te rtsig pa dang bum pa la sogs pa dang / shi ba'i lus la yang sems med pa'i phyir dbang po med na de'i rgyu de nyid yin te ;
translated: If the faculties do not exist, then the body is not the cause of the faculties because a mind does not exist in a wall, a pot, and so on, or in a dead body.

original: 'bras bu de la nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dogs pa sngon du dong bas bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu de la nges pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i dogs pa sngon du dong bas bstan pa ni /
translated: The response to this qualm is stated:

original: sems las kyang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sems las kyang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Even from the mind.

original: kyang gi sgras sems kyi zhes bya ba bsdus pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: kyang gi sgras sems kyi zhes bya ba bsdus pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The word even indicates that the phrase from the mind includes the word even.

original: sems kyi yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sems kyi yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase even from the mind.

original: gang gi phyir goms pa'i bskyed bya'i rnam pa mthong ba las dbang po rnams skye ba'i dang po la skye ba snga ma'i dbang po'i sems rgyu'i khyad par du grub pa yin gyi 'bras bu'i khyad par ni de med na grub pa ma yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir goms pa'i bskyed bya'i rnam pa mthong ba las dbang po rnams skye ba'i dang po la skye ba snga ma'i dbang po'i sems rgyu'i khyad par du grub pa yin gyi 'bras bu'i khyad par ni de med na grub pa ma yin la /
translated: Because the faculties arise from seeing the aspect that is to be generated by the mind, the mind of the previous life is established as a special cause of the faculties that arise in the first moment of life. The special effect is not established without it.

original: de las gzhan pa lus la sogs pa yang rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa lus la sogs pa yang rgyu ma yin no //
translated: And other causes such as the body are not causes.üîΩTherefore, it is illogical that one who dies due to incomplete causes would link with another birth.

original: de'i phyir rgyu ma tshang ba las shi ba skye ba gzhan du mtshams sbyor ba ma yin pa mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu ma tshang ba las shi ba skye ba gzhan du mtshams sbyor ba ma yin pa mi rigs par bstan pa ni /
translated: The response to this is stated:

original: des ni rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: des ni rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is devoid of causes.

original: zhes bya ba ste med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist.

original: kun zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa 'ba' zhig kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: kun zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa 'ba' zhig kho na ma yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúall‚Äù does not refer only to arhats.

original: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi yang zhes bya bar dgongs bas dgag pa'i dag gcig yin pa'am /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams kyi yang zhes bya bar dgongs bas dgag pa'i dag gcig yin pa'am /
translated: The intended meaning is that it refers to ordinary beings as well.

original: so so'i skye po rnams su ma zad kyi dgra bcom pa @292b rnams kyi yang yin no //
analyzed: so so'i skye po rnams su ma zad kyi dgra bcom pa @292b rnams kyi yang yin no //
translated: It is not only ordinary beings, but also arhats.

original: gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems sam dbang po yang rung de'i yang rgyun du byed pa bkag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems sam dbang po yang rung de'i yang rgyun du byed pa bkag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because the continuum of the mind or the faculties of one who is free of afflictions is not stopped.

original: 'on te dbang po'i sems kyang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir bzlog pas khyab pa yin na ma mthong ba la khyad par med pa nyid kyis ma nges pa'i phyir mi rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te dbang po'i sems kyang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir bzlog pas khyab pa yin na ma mthong ba la khyad par med pa nyid kyis ma nges pa'i phyir mi rigs pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: But if it is the case that the mind of the faculties is not seen to connect, then the pervasion is reversed. Since there is no difference in what is not seen, it is unreasonable. This is demonstrated in the line:

original: de'i phyir 'di 'dra zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di 'dra zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore, it is like this.‚Äù

original: 'chi ba sems nyid yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'chi ba sems nyid yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because death is the mind itself,

original: zhes bya ba nye bar mtshon pa ni dbang po nyid la sogs par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nye bar mtshon pa ni dbang po nyid la sogs par ro //
translated: the faculties and so on are illustrated by the word ‚Äúitself.‚Äù

original: nang gi rig pa'i khyad par gyis ni lus kyi zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //üîΩji ltar lus tha dad pa la 'jug pa nyid lus tha dad pa la dmigs pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du lus gzhan la mtshams sbyor ba can nyid kyang lus gzhan la dmigs pa ni sems gzhan skyed par byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: nang gi rig pa'i khyad par gyis ni lus kyi zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o // ji ltar lus tha dad pa la 'jug pa nyid lus tha dad pa la dmigs pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du lus gzhan la mtshams sbyor ba can nyid kyang lus gzhan la dmigs pa ni sems gzhan skyed par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: The qualification ‚Äúinternal‚Äù is to be supplied in the phrase ‚Äúbecause of the difference in the internal organ.‚ÄùüîΩJust as the fact that the mental organ is engaged in different bodies is the reason for its being the objective support of different bodies, so too, the fact that it is connected with another body is the reason for its being the objective support of another body.

original: de'i phyir yang ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur bar bstan pa ni /
translated: The fact that the mental organ is the objective support of another body is the reason for its producing another mind.

original: des na ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: des na ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: Therefore, the reason is inconclusive.üîΩThus, the reason is inconclusive.

original: rab tu grub pa ma yin pa'i khyad par yang gtan tshigs yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rab tu grub pa ma yin pa'i khyad par yang gtan tshigs yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The qualification ‚Äúnot well established‚Äù is to be supplied in the phrase ‚Äúbecause of the difference in the internal organ.‚Äù

original: lus gzhan pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: lus gzhan pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: The mental organ is not different from the body,

original: de'i phyir lus ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi rgyun la phan byed pa'i phyir rten yin gyi skyed par byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lus ni yid kyi rnam shes kyi rgyun la phan byed pa'i phyir rten yin gyi skyed par byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: because the body is the basis of the mental consciousness because it assists the continuum of the mental consciousness, but not because it produces it.

original: de yi shes pas phan 'dogs phyir //
analyzed: de yi shes pas phan 'dogs phyir //
translated: Because the mental organ assists the consciousness,

original: yid ni lus la brten par bshad //
analyzed: yid ni lus la brten par bshad //
translated: the mental organ is said to be based on the body.

original: 'ga' zhig tshe na sems rgyun gyi //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tshe na sems rgyun gyi //
translated: Some say: The mindstream is sometimes severed.üîΩ

original: phan 'dogs byed pa'ang yin bla ste //
analyzed: phan 'dogs byed pa'ang yin bla ste //
translated: Some say that it is also a helper of the mind-continuum.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir yid kyi rgyun la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yid kyi rgyun la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore, in the mind-continuum.‚Äù

original: 'bru'i rgyun bzhin zhes bya ba ni sa bon las skyed pa ni chu la sogs pas phan byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bru'i rgyun bzhin zhes bya ba ni sa bon las skyed pa ni chu la sogs pas phan byed pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúLike a stream of grain‚Äù means that the production from the seed is helped by water, etc.

original: de lta bu de yang sems skye ba brgyud par rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta bu de yang sems skye ba brgyud par rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'jug pa yin la /
translated: That is also the uninterrupted engagement in the continuum of the arising of the mind.

original: snying rje la sogs pa de'i chos rnams phul du byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: snying rje la sogs pa de'i chos rnams phul du byung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The qualities of compassion, etc. become excellent.üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir / sgrub byed snying rje goms las de //
analyzed: de'i phyir / sgrub byed snying rje goms las de //
translated: ‚ÄúThe practice is from the cultivation of compassion.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba 'di'i gnyen po 'di grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di'i gnyen po 'di grub pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: This is the establishment of the antidote.üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: des na sems kyi rgyun thog ma med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na sems kyi rgyun thog ma med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe beginningless mind-continuum.‚ÄùüîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir gang gi 'du byed nyid nges pa yin pa ni rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems ni sems las yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gi 'du byed nyid nges pa yin pa ni rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems ni sems las yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe mind is from the mind, because of the certainty of the formative forces.‚Äù

original: skye ba dang po la lus la sogs pa 'gyur ba ma yin yang de 'gyur na 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang po la lus la sogs pa 'gyur ba ma yin yang de 'gyur na 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In the first birth, the body, etc. are not transformed, but if they are transformed, they are transformed.

original: sems ni lus 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid @293a * //
analyzed: sems ni lus 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid @293a * //
translated: The mind is the nature of the body's support.

original: yin la 'bad pa med pa'i rgyun nyid kyis brtan pa yin yang snying la de'i chos rnams goms pa las 'byung ba nyid kyis 'bad pa la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar byung ba'am phul du byung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yin la 'bad pa med pa'i rgyun nyid kyis brtan pa yin yang snying la de'i chos rnams goms pa las 'byung ba nyid kyis 'bad pa la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar byung ba'am phul du byung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Even though it is stable by the continuity of effortless exertion, it is not necessarily arisen or excellent, because it depends on exertion due to the arising of its dharmas in the heart.

original: mchongs pa la sogs pa lta bu yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mchongs pa la sogs pa lta bu yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: It is shown to be like jumping, etc.

original: gal te goms pa yod med ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: gal te goms pa yod med ces bya ba ste /
translated: If there is no cultivation, it is said.

original: rab kyi ni yul ma yin pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rab kyi ni yul ma yin pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The best has the object.

original: mthar phyin pa ni mthar thug pa gang yin pa der cung zad tsam ni dpag tu yod pa phul du byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar phyin pa ni mthar thug pa gang yin pa der cung zad tsam ni dpag tu yod pa phul du byung ba ma yin no //
translated: The ultimate is that which is perfected. Even a little bit is not excellent.

original: khyad par ni phul du byung bar snang ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par ni phul du byung bar snang ba'o //
translated: The distinction is the appearance of excellence.

original: khyad par 'gyur na yang zhes bya ba ni phul du byung bar 'gyur na yang ngo //
analyzed: khyad par 'gyur na yang zhes bya ba ni phul du byung bar 'gyur na yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúIf there were a difference‚Äù means if there were a special quality.

original: rang bzhin ni dus ji tsam pa nyid dang khyad par ji tsam pa nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni dus ji tsam pa nyid dang khyad par ji tsam pa nyid kyang ngo //
translated: The nature is just the duration and just the special quality.

original: de las 'da' min ni 'bad pa med pa'i rgyun nyid dang tshad med pa'i phul du byung ba nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: de las 'da' min ni 'bad pa med pa'i rgyun nyid dang tshad med pa'i phul du byung ba nyid kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúIt would not go beyond that‚Äù means that the stream would not be without effort and the special quality would not be immeasurable.

original: shin tu goms pa'i mchongs pa yang dpag tshad dam dpag tshad phyed du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shin tu goms pa'i mchongs pa yang dpag tshad dam dpag tshad phyed du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even with great practice, a jump would not be a yojana or half a yojana.

original: chu khyad par can du bskol ba yin yang 'bar ba'i mthar thug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: chu khyad par can du bskol ba yin yang 'bar ba'i mthar thug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Even if water is boiled with special ingredients, it will not reach a boil.

original: rten chu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten chu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the support, the water itself, is not there.

original: goms pa ni rang bzhin la khyad par gyi rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: goms pa ni rang bzhin la khyad par gyi rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Practice is not a cause of a special quality in the nature.

original: de med na rgyu ni de'i rgyu ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te shin tu phul du byung ba nyid dang phul du byung ba'i rgyu nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na rgyu ni de'i rgyu ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te shin tu phul du byung ba nyid dang phul du byung ba'i rgyu nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were, it would follow that the cause would not be the cause of that, because a very special quality and a special cause are contradictory.

original: mchongs pa phul du byung ba tsam dang ldan pa ni shin tu phul du byung ba yin yang mchongs pa'i bdag nyid las ldog pa ma yin na gang gis 'gal bar 'gyur phul du byung bar lan cig sgro btags pas kyang rang bzhin las ldog pa ma yin
analyzed: mchongs pa phul du byung ba tsam dang ldan pa ni shin tu phul du byung ba yin yang mchongs pa'i bdag nyid las ldog pa ma yin na gang gis 'gal bar 'gyur phul du byung bar lan cig sgro btags pas kyang rang bzhin las ldog pa ma yin
translated: Even if it is once imputed as excellent, it is not the opposite of its nature.

original: te / mchongs pa dang snying rje ba la sogs pa dang khyad par ci yod snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: te / mchongs pa dang snying rje ba la sogs pa dang khyad par ci yod snyam du sems pa la /
translated: What is the difference between jumping and compassion, etc.?

original: byas te gal te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byas te gal te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Thinking this, he says, ‚ÄúIf it is made‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: goms pas byas pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: goms pas byas pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: The difference is made by practice.

original: rang yod pa la 'bad rtsol gzhan la ltos pa ni mchongs ba 'phel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rang yod pa la 'bad rtsol gzhan la ltos pa ni mchongs ba 'phel ba ma yin te /
translated: The existence of something that depends on other efforts is not an increase in jumping,

original: phul du byung ba gzhan la rten med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phul du byung ba gzhan la rten med pa'i phyir /
translated: because there is no other excellence that is supported.

original: khyad par dag ni med 'phel zhing //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par dag ni med 'phel zhing //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
translated: There is no difference in excellence.

original: yang 'bad pa la sogs pa yin yang chu shin tu cher bskol ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'phel ba kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la khyad par dang rten dngos su 'gal ba ma yin yang khyad par byed pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir 'gal ba'i
analyzed: yang 'bad pa la sogs pa yin yang chu shin tu cher bskol ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'phel ba kho na yin no snyam du sems pa la khyad par dang rten dngos su 'gal ba ma yin yang khyad par byed pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir 'gal ba'i
translated: Although there is no direct contradiction between the difference and the support, there is contradiction because of contradiction with the agent of the difference.

original: 'bras bu nyid kyis 'di rang bzhin yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid kyis 'di rang bzhin yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The result itself is taught to be the nature.

original: rang bzhin de 'dra ba yin te //üîΩzhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin de 'dra ba yin te // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature is like that.

original: slar yang 'bad pa la brten pa @293b dang rten mi brten pa nyid dag la go rims bzhin du mi 'phel ba dang / rang bzhin ma yin pa'i skyon ma yin no //
analyzed: slar yang 'bad pa la brten pa @293b dang rten mi brten pa nyid dag la go rims bzhin du mi 'phel ba dang / rang bzhin ma yin pa'i skyon ma yin no //
translated: Again, in dependence on effort, etc., there is no increase in the supported and the support, and there is no fault of non-nature.üîΩWhat is the reason?

original: ci las yin snyam du sems pa la dang po la gtan tshigs bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ci las yin snyam du sems pa la dang po la gtan tshigs bstan pa ni /
translated: In the first, the reason is taught.

original: de la zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la /
translated: There,

original: de la ni snga ma'i rgyus rdzogs pa'i khyad par la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang dag gi yin pa de dag gi'o //
analyzed: de la ni snga ma'i rgyus rdzogs pa'i khyad par la phan 'dogs pa'i nus pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang dag gi yin pa de dag gi'o //
translated: there, in the previous cause, the power of benefitting the difference that is completed is completely perfected. Those who have that are those who have that.

original: phyogs gnyis pa la yang rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas khyad par 'phel yang zhes bya ba'i bar te /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa la yang rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas khyad par 'phel yang zhes bya ba'i bar te /
translated: The second position is from ‚ÄúIf it is permanent‚Äù up to ‚Äúbut if it does increase, it is not supreme.‚Äù

original: rten gnas ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: rten gnas ma yin pa ni /
translated: The non-abiding of the basis

original: rten gnas pa med pas rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rten gnas pa med pas rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: is not natural because it does not abide in the basis.

original: khyad par dag ni mi 'phel zhing /
analyzed: khyad par dag ni mi 'phel zhing /
translated: Qualities do not increase

original: 'phel yang phul du byung ba ma yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'phel yang phul du byung ba ma yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: and if they do increase, they are not supreme.

original: phul du byung ba'i 'phel ba ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: phul du byung ba'i 'phel ba ma yin pa ni /
translated: Not being supreme in increase

original: slar yang 'bad pa la ltos pa dang / rten brtan pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir des khyab pa ni de las bzlog pa la mi 'gyur ro zhes bzlog pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: slar yang 'bad pa la ltos pa dang / rten brtan pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir des khyab pa ni de las bzlog pa la mi 'gyur ro zhes bzlog pa bstan pa ni /
translated: is pervaded by that because it depends on effort again and because it does not occur without the stability of the basis. The reverse of that is taught:

original: gang tshe byas 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang tshe byas 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: When it becomes created.

original: rten mi brtan pa nyid log na rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid ldog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rten mi brtan pa nyid log na rang bzhin ma yin pa nyid ldog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The reversal of the non-stability of the basis is the reversal of the non-naturalness.

original: 'grel par yang de lta bu'i don go bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'grel par yang de lta bu'i don go bar bya'o //
translated: The commentary should be understood in that way.

original: khyad par ni phul du byung ba ste de tsam du byung bar rnam par gnas pa phul du byung ba nyid khyad par de la 'byung ba 'phel par ci ste mi 'gyur /
analyzed: khyad par ni phul du byung ba ste de tsam du byung bar rnam par gnas pa phul du byung ba nyid khyad par de la 'byung ba 'phel par ci ste mi 'gyur /
translated: The difference is the excellence, and the excellence of the arising of that is the excellence of the arising. Why would it not increase?

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught:

original: khyad par yin no cog ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par yin no cog ces bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe difference is the excellence.‚Äù

original: rang gi rgyun du gyur pa tsam gyis ni khyad par ni rang gi ngo bo tsam du gyur pa de ltar rnam par gzhag pa phul du byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rgyun du gyur pa tsam gyis ni khyad par ni rang gi ngo bo tsam du gyur pa de ltar rnam par gzhag pa phul du byung ba ma yin no //
translated: The difference is not established as the excellence of the mere arising of the nature of the thing that has become its own continuum.

original: 'on kyang zhes bya bas khyad par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya bas khyad par bstan pa ni /
translated: However, the teaching of the difference by the word ‚Äúbut‚Äù is this:

original: mchongs ba'i yul snga ma nyid la slar yang 'bad rtsol la ltos pa yang chu bskol ba 'phel pa yang mi brtan pa nyid kyis phul du byung bar 'phel ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mchongs ba'i yul snga ma nyid la slar yang 'bad rtsol la ltos pa yang chu bskol ba 'phel pa yang mi brtan pa nyid kyis phul du byung bar 'phel ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Even though one relies on effort again in the same place of jumping, the increase of the boiling water is not the excellence of the increase because it is unstable.üîΩThe teaching of this is:

original: 'di dang me dang 'brel pa med kyang yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i de ma thag tu rten yang ma yin zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dang me dang 'brel pa med kyang yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i de ma thag tu rten yang ma yin zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not the support.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir yod pa las 'phel ba mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba ni phul du byung bar mi 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yod pa las 'phel ba mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba ni phul du byung bar mi 'phel ba'o //
translated: Because there is no increase of existence to the point of finality, there is no increase of excellence.

original: khyab pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúPervasion‚Äù means that it exists in that very thing.

original: de med pa'i phyir ni khyab par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde las bzlog pa srid pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir ni khyab par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro // de las bzlog pa srid pa'i phyir //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the absence of that‚Äù means because of the absence of the pervader.

original: zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin no //üîΩ'dis ni gang tshe byas gyur pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin no // 'dis ni gang tshe byas gyur pa //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of the possibility of the opposite‚Äù means that the pervader is contradictory.üîΩThis explains ‚Äúwhen it becomes produced.

original: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation.üîΩ

original: rten mi brtan pa nyid gyur na //
analyzed: rten mi brtan pa nyid gyur na //
translated: ‚ÄúIf the support becomes unstable,

original: rang bzhin de 'dra 'ang ma yin te //üîΩzhes bya ba 'ba' zhig @294a * //
analyzed: rang bzhin de 'dra 'ang ma yin te // zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig @294a * //
translated: the nature is also not like that.‚Äù

original: ma yin te /üîΩ'on kyang slar yang 'bad rtsol la ltos pa la yang sbyar bar nus pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ma yin te / 'on kyang slar yang 'bad rtsol la ltos pa la yang sbyar bar nus pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is not the only explanation.üîΩHowever, it can also be applied to that which depends on further effort.

original: yang rtsol ba la ltos pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang rtsol ba la ltos pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is shown by ‚Äúthat which depends on further effort.‚Äù

original: khyad par byed pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa med pa'am khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par byed pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa med pa'am khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: In particular, ‚Äúwith an effort‚Äù means that it is either without a pervader or in contradiction with a pervader.

original: gang zhig yang rtsol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang 'bad rtsol la ltos pa la yang phul du byung bar 'phel ba ni /
analyzed: gang zhig yang rtsol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang 'bad rtsol la ltos pa la yang phul du byung bar 'phel ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú That which is called effort‚Äù and so on means that even that which depends on exertion has an increase that is excellent.

original: rten dang 'gal ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rten dang 'gal ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: This is because it is an effect that is in contradiction with its basis.

original: rang bzhin med pa yin no zhes dgongs pa yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa yin no zhes dgongs pa yin te /
translated: The intended meaning is that it is essenceless.

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid ces bya ba ni rten mi brtan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid ces bya ba ni rten mi brtan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Essencelessness‚Äù means that the basis is not stable.

original: rgyu nye ba la ltos ba zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu 'byung ba'i 'phel ba dang ldan pa'i rten la dgongs nas 'gal ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrang gi dang gis 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyu nye ba la ltos ba zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu 'byung ba'i 'phel ba dang ldan pa'i rten la dgongs nas 'gal ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro // rang gi dang gis 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú That which depends on the proximity of a cause‚Äù means that it is an effect that is in contradiction with its basis, intending that it has an increase in the arising of the effect.

original: 'gal ba med pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: ‚Äú That which engages by its own nature‚Äù means that it is an effect that is not in contradiction with its basis.

original: mchongs pa dang chu bskol ba bzhin zhes bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: mchongs pa dang chu bskol ba bzhin zhes bya ba 'di la /
translated: ‚Äú Like jumping and boiling water‚Äù means that

original: chu bskol ba ni dpe yin te mchongs ba la ni sbyor bar nus pa yin no zhes dgongs pas so //
analyzed: chu bskol ba ni dpe yin te mchongs ba la ni sbyor bar nus pa yin no zhes dgongs pas so //
translated: The boiling water is the example, but the jumping is the application.üîΩWhen it has been done,

original: gang tshe byas gyur pa zhes bya ba de 'chad pa yin /
analyzed: gang tshe byas gyur pa zhes bya ba de 'chad pa yin /
translated: he explains that.
